tv.generator-info-name: XMLTV Merge by Ray Wilson for Renegades TV

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen
programme.desc: Film adaptation of the Tony and Grammy Award-winning musical about Evan Hansen, a high-school senior with a severe social anxiety disorder, and his journey of self-discovery and acceptance following the suicide of a fellow classmate. Starring Ben Platt, Julianne Moore and Amy Adams.

programme.title: The Gateway
programme.desc: A social worker assigned to the care of the daughter of a single mother intervenes when the dad returns from prison and lures them into a life of crime. Thriller directed by Michele Civetta, starring Shea Whigham, Olivia Munn, Zach Avery, Bruce Dern and Frank Grillo.

programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: A woman named Sarah opts for a cloning procedure after she receives a terminal diagnosis. She unexpectedly recovers, but her attempts to have the clone decommissioned fail, leading to a court-mandated battle to the death. Sci-fi thriller, starring Karen Gillan and Aaron Paul.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain
programme.desc: English artist Louis Wain rises to prominence at the end of the 19th century for his surreal cat paintings, which seem to reflect his declining sanity. Director Will Sharpe's biographical drama, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Claire Foy, Andrea Riseborough and Toby Jones.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker.

programme.title: The Matrix Resurrections
programme.desc: To find out if his reality is a physical or mental construct, Mr Anderson - aka Neo - has to choose to follow the white rabbit once more. Neo already knows what he has to do, but what he doesn't yet know is that the Matrix is stronger, more secure and far more dangerous than ever before. Sci-fi sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II.

programme.title: Four Good Days
programme.desc: Heroin addict Molly shows up at the house of her long-suffering mother, Deb, seeking help. But 10 painful years of estrangement, drug use and addiction have taken a toll on the already fragile mother-daughter relationship. Molly explains that a doctor has offered her a shred of hope - a monthly shot of an opioid antagonist, which prevents toxic substances from binding to the central nervous system. However, there's a catch - Molly must stay clean for four days to receive the promising treatment. Drama, starring Glenn Close and Mila Kunis.

programme.title: Girl
programme.desc: A young woman returns to her small home town intent on killing her abusive father, only to discover someone murdered him the day before. As the girl searches for answers, she uncovers a family legacy more dangerous than she had ever imagined. Thriller, starring Bella Thorne, Chad Faust and Mickey Rourke.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.

programme.title: The Cinema ListUnlikely Heroes
programme.desc: Welcome to The Cinema List, where some of the unlikeliest heroes in film are explored, from a tiny pigeon in Valiant (2005) to a group of loyal toys in Bobbleheads (2020).

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In 1930, 16-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the world's first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. Georgia's father is called out of retirement by the Mayor to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save the city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called Joe and joins a group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist. Animated adventure, with the voices of Olivia Cooke and Kenneth Branagh.

programme.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
programme.desc: As middle-school student Emily Elizabeth struggles to fit in at home and school, she is given a small red puppy by a magical animal rescuer. However, the pup soon grows to gigantic proportions, and attracts the attention of a genetics company who wish to breed super-sized animals. Emily and her clueless uncle Casey have to fight the forces of greed as they go on the run across New York City. Family adventure based on the book series, starring Jack Whitehall, Darby Camp and John Cleese.

programme.title: Resident EvilWelcome to Raccoon City
programme.desc: Once the booming home of pharmaceutical giant Umbrella Corporation, Raccoon City is now a dying Midwestern town. The company's exodus left the city a wasteland, with great evil brewing below the surface. When that evil is unleashed, the townspeople are for ever changed, and a small group of survivors must work together to uncover the truth behind Umbrella and make it through the night. Sci-fi horror, starring Kaya Scodelario, Robbie Amell and Hannah John-Kamen.

programme.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
programme.desc: As middle-school student Emily Elizabeth struggles to fit in at home and school, she is given a small red puppy by a magical animal rescuer. programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Will Spann is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents' home when she mysteriously disappears without a trace during a stop at a gas station. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisa's parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jaimie Alexander.

programme.title: The Survivor
programme.desc: Drama based on the story of Harry Haft, a survivor of the Auschwitz concentration camp who boxed his fellow inmates to stay alive. Haunted by memories and guilt, he attempts to use high-profile fights against boxing legends like Rocky Marciano as a way to find his first love again. Directed by Barry Levinson and starring Ben Foster, John Leguizamo, Peter Sarsgaard and Danny DeVito.(n)

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker.(n)

programme.title: baby done
programme.desc: Wannabe-adventurer Zoe freaks out when she falls pregnant to her long-term boyfriend Tim. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams before becoming a mother. Comedy, starring Rose Matafeo, Matthew Lewis and Emily Barclay.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Period mystery thriller, directed by Guy Ritchie, starring Robert Downey Jr and Jude Law. Sherlock Holmes and his assistant Dr John Watson think they have seen the back of serial killer Lord Blackwood. But when the evil occultist apparently comes back from the dead, they are once again drawn into a dangerous game.

programme.title: Pinocchio
programme.desc: Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits. Matteo Garrone's adaptation of the classic tale, starring Federico Ielapi and Roberto Benigni. In Italian.

programme.title: Every Breath You Take
programme.desc: A psychiatrist's career is thrown into disarray when one of his clients commits suicide. He then finds his family life disrupted after introducing her surviving brother to his wife and daughter. Thriller, starring Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan and Sam Claflin.

programme.title: The Desperate Hour
programme.desc: Recently widowed mother Amy Carr finds her small town thrown into chaos as a shooting takes place at her son's school. Miles away on foot in the dense forest, Amy desperately races against time to save her son as authorities place the town on lockdown. Thriller, starring Naomi Watts, Colton Gobbo and Sierra Maltby.

programme.title: In the Heights
programme.desc: Film version of the Broadway musical in which Usnavi, a sympathetic New York bodega owner in the neighbourhood of Washington Heights, on the northern tip of Manhattan. He saves every penny every day as he imagines and sings about a better life. Musical, starring Anthony Ramos, Corey Hawkins and Leslie Grace.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Thriller starring Matthew McConaughey and Anne Hathaway. Fisherman Baker Dill is tracked down by his ex-wife, who offers him a large sum of money to murder her abusive new spouse.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: Comedy starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and the voice of Seth MacFarlane. When young John Bennett's wish that his beloved toy bear Ted could come to life is granted, the two become inseparable. But as they grow older, although not necessarily more mature, the potty-mouthed furry one starts to get in the way of John's other relationships.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis. When executive recruiter Jamie convinces LA-based art director Dylan to relocate to the Big Apple, the pair become friends. But having both been through the relationship mill, they are determined not to follow the cosy ways of Hollywood rom-coms and embark on a sex-only relationship. Then Jamie decides she wants to return to dating.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: Supernatural comedy starring Dan Stevens, Leslie Mann, Isla Fisher and Judi Dench. When novelist Charles Condomine consults renowned medium Madame Arcati, she conjures up the spirit of his first wife, Elvira, much to the consternation of the current Mrs Condomine.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Maggie Grace and Toby Kebbell. With a category 5 hurricane bearing down on an Alabama town, an opportunistic group of crooks use the meteorological mayhem as cover for an audacious raid on a US Treasury facility. However, standing in the criminals' way are a maverick ATF agent and a stormchaser with a tragic past.

programme.title: The Desperate Hour
programme.desc: Recently widowed mother Amy Carr finds her small town thrown into chaos as a shooting takes place at her son's school. Miles away on foot in the dense forest, Amy desperately races against time to save her son as authorities place the town on lockdown. Thriller, starring Naomi Watts, Colton Gobbo and Sierra Maltby.

programme.title: Centurion
programme.desc: Period action drama starring Michael Fassbender and Dominic West. In the north of Britain in 117AD the Romans are meeting resistance from local warriors. When the fabled Ninth Legion is sent to eradicate the rebels once and for all, they discover the true strength of a formidable enemy.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting from one of the most enigmatic artists of all time, an ambitious dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control. Action thriller, starring Claes Bang, Elizabeth Debicki, Mick Jagger and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: An ex-soldier is forced into action when armed terrorists take control of a packed football stadium. Action drama, starring Dave Bautista, Pierce Brosnan and Ray Stevenson.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: Comedy starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and the voice of Seth MacFarlane. programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis. When executive recruiter Jamie convinces LA-based art director Dylan to relocate to the Big Apple, the pair become friends. But having both been through the relationship mill, they are determined not to follow the cosy ways of Hollywood rom-coms and embark on a sex-only relationship. Then Jamie decides she wants to return to dating.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Black comedy starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis. Three downtrodden, demoralised workers decide enough is enough and hatch a plan to kill each other's bosses. They seek advice from an ex-con, but devising the perfect crime proves trickier than expected.

programme.title: Warcraftthe Beginning
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure based on the popular video game, starring Toby Kebbell, Travis Fimmel and Paula Patton. When a marauding army of orcs uses a portal to invade the land of Azeroth, it falls to a group of brave humans and dissenting orcs to mount a resistance.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Iko Uwais and Joe Taslim. Trapped inside an apartment building run by a ruthless drugs lord, a crack team of police are forced to fight their way out.

programme.title: Just Go with It
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Jennifer Aniston, Adam Sandler and Nicole Kidman. Insatiable womaniser Danny Maccabee pretends to be married to attract women only interested in casual sex. But when he involves a work colleague in the deception by asking her to pose as his estranged wife, things get very complicated indeed.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: An ex-soldier is forced into action when armed terrorists take control of a packed football stadium. Action drama, starring Dave Bautista, Pierce Brosnan and Ray Stevenson.

programme.title: Centurion
programme.desc: Period action drama starring Michael Fassbender and Dominic West. In the north of Britain in 117AD the Romans are meeting resistance from local warriors. When the fabled Ninth Legion is sent to eradicate the rebels once and for all, they discover the true strength of a formidable enemy.

programme.title: The Cinema ListUnlikely Heroes
programme.desc: Welcome to The Cinema List, where some of the unlikeliest heroes in film are explored, from a tiny pigeon in Valiant (2005) to a group of loyal toys in Bobbleheads (2020).

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Drama starring Viggo Mortensen and Frank Langella. Parents Ben and Leslie Cash live off the grid with their six children in a cabin in the backwoods of Washington state where their brood are immersed in left-wing activism and survivalism. However, following a family tragedy, the Cash clan are forced to return to society where they find "normal life" to be a confusing and frightening challenge.

programme.title: Words on Bathroom Walls
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate, who inspires him to not be defined by his condition. Romantic drama, starring Charlie Plummer, Andy Garcia and Taylor Russell.

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: Alice is a reclusive writer, resigned to a solitary life on the seaside cliffs of southern England while the Second World War rages across the Channel. When she opens her front door one day to find she has to adopt a young London evacuee named Frank, she's resistant. It's not long, however, before the two realise they have more in common in their pasts than Alice had assumed. Romantic drama, starring Gemma Arterton, Gugu Mbatha-Raw and Tom Courtenay.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Black comedy starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis. Three downtrodden, demoralised workers decide enough is enough and hatch a plan to kill each other's bosses. They seek advice from an ex-con, but devising the perfect crime proves trickier than expected.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Jamie Foxx. Stealth bomber pilots Ben Gannon, Kara Wade and Henry Purcell embark upon a perilous mission to regain control of a computer-piloted plane that seems intent on bombing Tajikistan.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Keanu Reeves. An ex-hitman embarks on a bloody trail of revenge when some hoodlums kill his dog.

programme.title: The Raid 2
programme.desc: Action thriller sequel starring Iko Uwais. Having escaped with his life from a tower block overrun with gangsters, rookie cop Rama thinks that his work is done. But he soon realises that these men were part of a larger operation and in order to bring the ringleaders down he must go deep under cover.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: Science-fiction action thriller produced by JJ Abrams, creator of TV series Lost. As a group of New York friends throws a leaving party for one of their number, the event is recorded on a video camera. But the city is thrown into panic by an unknown force, with the camera acting as chief witness to the destruction.

programme.title: Four Kids and It
programme.desc: Fantasy drama starring Matthew Goode and Paula Patton, and featuring the voice of Michael Caine. Two sets of siblings, brought together by their dating parents, clash on a surprise holiday to the Cornwall coast. When they encounter a sand creature known as the Psammead, the children's lives are transformed as their new friend grants them one wish a day.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure from director Michael Bay, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox. Unsuspecting teenager Sam Witwicky holds the key to the survival of the human race when alien enemies the Autobots and the Decepticons arrive on Earth and continue their war.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama starring Matt Damon and Jodie Foster. In the year 2154, the wealthy elite live on a utopian space station called Elysium while the rest of the population are trapped on a ruined and polluted Earth. A dying man named Max agrees to take on a mission that could bring equality to the different worlds.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family. Animated adventure sequel, starring Rose Byrne and Domhnall Gleeson, with the voice of James Corden.

programme.title: GhostbustersAfterlife
programme.desc: When a single mum and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather Egon Spengler left behind. Supernatural comedy reboot, directed by Jason Reitman and starring Carrie Coon, Paul Rudd, Finn Wolfhard and Mckenna Grace, with cameo appearances by Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Ernie Hudson, Annie Potts and Sigourney Weaver.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Denzel Washington and Mark Wahlberg. Two undercover agents working for different organisations are planted in the same criminal gang, unaware of each other's true identity. While getting in each other's way, the danger is that a powerful Mob boss will escape justice.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Woody Harrelson and Jesse Eisenberg. Four mismatched people form a reluctant alliance in a world overrun by zombies and drive west, where they hope a Californian amusement park will be the ideal place to ride out the undead storm.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama starring Matt Damon and Jodie Foster. In the year 2154, the wealthy elite live on a utopian space station called Elysium while the rest of the population are trapped on a ruined and polluted Earth. A dying man named Max agrees to take on a mission that could bring equality to the different worlds.(n)

programme.title: Transformers

programme.title: Weathering with You
programme.desc: Poor high school student Hodaka Morishima is helped by Keisuke Suga and fast food worker Hina Amano. Suga hires him as his assistant at a small occult magazine publishing company, where they investigate urban legends related to the rainy weather in Tokyo. From a psychic, they hear the legend of a `sunshine girl" who can control the weather. Director Makoto Shinkai's animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Brandon Engman, Lee Pace and Alison Brie.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson. Having been forcibly disbanded for disgracing themselves, a cappella group the Barden Bellas discover a get-out clause - all they have to do is win an international singing competition in Copenhagen.(n)

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: David Ghantt, a guard at an armoured car company in southern USA, organises one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Jared Hess's crime comedy based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery, starring Zach Galifianakis, Kristen Wiig and Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Two astronauts become stranded in orbit when an avalanche of debris from a decommissioned satellite rips their shuttle to pieces. Their only hope for survival is to get to the International Space Station before their dwindling air supply disappears completely.(n)

programme.title: No Sudden Move
programme.desc: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances, and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways. Steven Soderbergh's crime drama, starring Don Cheadle, Benicio Del Toro and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Mad MaxFury Road
programme.desc: Futuristic action adventure starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron. In a world where water is precious and humanity faces extinction, a one-armed woman takes off across the desert with a lorry-load of females who've been imprisoned to bear children. Riding shotgun is Max, the infamous "Road Warrior".(n)

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer and Hugh Grant, based on the popular 1960s TV series. With the discovery that a criminal mastermind has a nuclear capability, CIA operative Napoleon Solo and KGB agent Illya Kuryakin are teamed up to thwart the threat. But first the pair must put their differences aside.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Cleo
programme.desc: Comedy starring Sidney James, Kenneth Williams and Amanda Barrie. The incorrigible Mark Antony falls for Cleopatra's charms and together they begin plotting against the hapless Julius Caesar.

programme.title: Kramer vs Kramer
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama starring Dustin Hoffman and Meryl Streep. When his wife Joanna walks out on him, advertising executive Ted Kramer is left to bring up their young son Billy alone. But as he struggles to fulfil the roles of both mother and father to the child, his professional life starts to suffer.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.

programme.title: Ben Hur
programme.desc: Oscar-winning period epic starring Charlton Heston. Wealthy prince Judah Ben-Hur sets himself up against the tyranny of his Roman masters at the time of Christ, and is condemned to almost certain death as a galley slave by his childhood friend Messala. But the two men are fated to meet again.

programme.title: The Cinema ListUnlikely Heroes
programme.desc: Welcome to The Cinema List, where some of the unlikeliest heroes in film are explored, from a tiny pigeon in Valiant (2005) to a group of loyal toys in Bobbleheads (2020).

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring John Wayne and Maureen O'Hara. Sean Thornton returns to his native Galway to settle down in peace after growing up in America. The quiet life still eludes him, however, as he finds himself reluctantly sparring with his neighbours, his sweetheart and his conscience.

programme.title: Black Beauty
programme.desc: Children's drama based on the classic novel by Anna Sewell, starring\nMark Lester. The horse Black Beauty is looked after with care by Joe Evans, but the two are parted when the Evans farm is taken over by a young squire.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
programme.desc: Classic western starring Burt Lancaster and Kirk Douglas. US Marshal Wyatt Earp tries to keep the peace in the lawless West of the 1870s. His chief adversary is the Clanton gang, but he also finds himself up against Doc Holliday, a dentist turned gambler, with a dim regard for the law. Doc's attitude changes when Earp rescues him from a mob, and the two join forces against the Clantons. After chasing the gang from Dodge City to Tombstone, both sides face each other in the legendary gunfight at the OK Corral.

programme.title: The Cinema ListUnlikely Heroes
programme.desc: Welcome to The Cinema List, where some of the unlikeliest heroes in film are explored, from a tiny pigeon in Valiant (2005) to a group of loyal toys in Bobbleheads (2020).

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts and Hugh Grant. An American film star bumps into a humble bookshop owner and they begin an unlikely affair. But their relationship is put under strain when the press finds out.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Richard Gere and Debra Winger. Zack Mayo, a determined loner, aims to rise above his past and become a US Navy pilot. First he must survive 13 weeks of gruelling physical and psychological officer training under the remorseless gaze of tough sergeant Emil Foley. But as his training becomes more intense, Zack becomes distracted by local factory worker Paula Pokrifki.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand and Kate Hudson. Despite warnings from his overprotective mother and a veteran rock journalist, a dream commission from Rolling Stone magazine to accompany a rock band on tour proves to be a life-changing experience for 15-year-old aspiring writer William Miller.

programme.title: Pan's Labyrinth
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fantasy horror directed by Guillermo del Toro and starring Ivana Baquero. In the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War, young Ofelia and her pregnant mother move to a remote village to join her new stepfather, a fascist soldier. There she encounters a faun who tells her she must complete three perilous tasks to claim her rightful place as a princess.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring John Wayne and Maureen O'Hara. Sean Thornton returns to his native Galway to settle down in peace after growing up in America. The quiet life still eludes him, however, as he finds himself reluctantly sparring with his neighbours, his sweetheart and his conscience.

programme.title: Pan's Labyrinth
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fantasy horror directed by Guillermo del Toro and starring Ivana Baquero. In the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War, young Ofelia and her pregnant mother move to a remote village to join her new stepfather, a fascist soldier. There she encounters a faun who tells her she must complete three perilous tasks to claim her rightful place as a princess.

programme.title: King Creole
programme.desc: Musical starring Elvis Presley. New Orleans nightclub singer Danny Fisher is drawn into a life of crime when he fails to graduate from school. But he soon finds his singing talents in demand and becomes attracted to a gangster's moll.

programme.title: The Amazing Mr Blunden
programme.desc: Fantasy mystery starring Laurence Naismith. With the First World War at an end, Christmas 1918 is approaching and a widowed mother of two has little money to spare for the children's presents. Then the mysterious but compassionate Mr Blunden comes to call and offers her work in his remote country mansion.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Robin Williams. In 1969, a young boy called Alan gets trapped in the strange jungle world of a magical board game he has unearthed on a building site. Twenty-six years later, two children discover the game and unwittingly unleash its dangerous magic. They also release Alan, now an adult, who realises that to escape the game they must play it to the end.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Audrey Hepburn and Gregory Peck. Joe Bradley, a journalist at an American news bureau in Rome, discovers a pretty girl apparently in a drunken stupor and reluctantly takes her home. Next morning, he is amazed to discover that his guest is a princess on a state visit.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand and Kate Hudson. Despite warnings from his overprotective mother and a veteran rock journalist, a dream commission from Rolling Stone magazine to accompany a rock band on tour proves to be a life-changing experience for 15-year-old aspiring writer William Miller.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Richard Gere and Debra Winger. Zack Mayo, a determined loner, aims to rise above his past and become a US Navy pilot. First he must survive 13 weeks of gruelling physical and psychological officer training under the remorseless gaze of tough sergeant Emil Foley. But as his training becomes more intense, Zack becomes distracted by local factory worker Paula Pokrifki.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Thriller starring Harrison Ford and Tommy Lee Jones. Despite protesting his innocence, Richard Kimble is sentenced to death for the murder of his wife. En route to prison, he is caught up in a disastrous escape attempt, and finds himself on the run. In order to clear his name, he must find the mysterious one-armed man with whom he struggled on the night of the murder, but the law is hot on his trail.

programme.title: Star TrekNemesis
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure - the tenth entry in the franchise - starring Patrick Stewart. The crew of the Enterprise are on the verge of splitting up, following the wedding of Riker and Troi, when they are sent to investigate a suspect Romulan treaty. On arrival, they discover that the new leader of Romulus is the spitting image of Captain Picard.

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Steven Seagal and Tommy Lee Jones. The Missouri, the US Navy's biggest battleship, is hijacked by ruthless criminals intent on stealing its lucrative nuclear arsenal. Only one man stands in their way - Casey Ryback, ship's cook and former Navy SEAL.

programme.title: The Amazing Mr Blunden
programme.desc: Fantasy mystery starring Laurence Naismith. With the First World War at an end, Christmas 1918 is approaching and a widowed mother of two has little money to spare for the children's presents. Then the mysterious but compassionate Mr Blunden comes to call and offers her work in his remote country mansion.

programme.title: Jumanji

They also release Alan, now an adult, who realises that to escape the game they must play it to the end.

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Steven Seagal and Tommy Lee Jones. The Missouri, the US Navy's biggest battleship, is hijacked by ruthless criminals intent on stealing its lucrative nuclear arsenal. Only one man stands in their way - Casey Ryback, ship's cook and former Navy SEAL.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Audrey Hepburn and Fred Astaire. Famous fashion photographer Dick Avery takes his latest beautiful discovery on a working trip to Paris, but she soon proves to be a far from perfect model.

programme.title: Once upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Epic spaghetti western starring Henry Fonda, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards and Charles Bronson. A cold-blooded killer is hired to ensure the progress of the railroad through a nascent frontier town. Standing in its way is recently widowed Jill McBain, whose property has a water supply that is vital for the venture.

programme.title: Sunset Blvd
programme.desc: Drama starring William Holden, Gloria Swanson and Erich von Stroheim. Screenwriter Joe Gillis floats dead in the swimming pool of a neglected Hollywood mansion. Six months earlier, out of work and desperate, he'd been hired as a writer by former silent screen star Norma Desmond, who was hoping to make a triumphant comeback.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: Western starring John Wayne and Geraldine Page. When cavalry scout Hondo Lane meets Mrs Lowe and her son living in the wilderness, he tries to persuade them to leave their ranch in anticipation of an Apache raid.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Humphrey Bogart, Audrey Hepburn and William Holden. Heartbroken Sabrina, daughter of the chauffeur to a wealthy family, is sent to France after falling for eligible bachelor David Larrabee. She returns a changed woman but will she be luckier in love second time around?

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Thriller starring Harrison Ford and Tommy Lee Jones. Despite protesting his innocence, Richard Kimble is sentenced to death for the murder of his wife. En route to prison, he is caught up in a disastrous escape attempt, and finds himself on the run. In order to clear his name, he must find the mysterious one-armed man with whom he struggled on the night of the murder, but the law is hot on his trail.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Sports drama starring Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall and Nicole Kidman. Cocky racing driver Cole Trickle is revved up to take the stock-car circuit by storm, but his aggressive driving style soon lands him in hospital. There he meets Dr Claire Lewicki, who gives the young driver more than racing to think about.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Courtroom drama starring Tom Cruise, Jack Nicholson and Demi Moore. Navy lawyer Daniel Kaffee is assigned to defend two marines accused of killing a colleague at their base in Cuba. As he gathers evidence for the case, Kaffee encounters strong opposition from the base's disciplinarian commanding officer.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Ewan McGregor and Naomi Watts. The holiday of a lifetime in Thailand turns into a nightmare for a family separated by the deadly 2004 Boxing Day tsunami. With the area a devastated wasteland, the struggle begins to find out who has survived.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Police thriller starring Al Pacino, based on the real-life story of a young undercover cop. Despite the violence and cynicism that surround him, Frank Serpico retains his ideals, refusing the pay-offs which are common to his colleagues. Gradually, his attitudes and behaviour isolate him within the force, and he faces danger from both sides of the law.

programme.title: Nashville
programme.desc: Director Robert Altman's influential ensemble comedy drama, featuring Shelley Duvall, Geraldine Chaplin, Ronee Blakley and Keith Carradine. With America caught up in Bicentennial fever, the Replacement Party plans a weekend-long political rally, including a country music concert, to promote its presidential candidate in Tennessee.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: Western starring John Wayne and Geraldine Page. When cavalry scout Hondo Lane meets Mrs Lowe and her son living in the wilderness, he tries to persuade them to leave their ranch in anticipation of an Apache raid.

programme.title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Fantasy based on the classic children's book by Roald Dahl, starring Gene Wilder. Most children, at one hungry time or another, dream of visiting a chocolate factory. For young Charlie Bucket the fantasy comes true when he finds a golden ticket in a candy bar: an invitation to tour the giant factory of eccentric sweet tycoon Willy Wonka.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Science-fiction drama starring Richard Dreyfuss. While investigating an extensive power failure in Indiana, Roy Neary encounters a UFO - a phenomenon also witnessed by Jillian Guiler and her young son. When he is unable to convince anyone of his sighting, Neary's strange behaviour starts to worry his family.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Courtroom drama starring Tom Cruise, Jack Nicholson and Demi Moore. Navy lawyer Daniel Kaffee is assigned to defend two marines accused of killing a colleague at their base in Cuba. As he gathers evidence for the case, Kaffee encounters strong opposition from the base's disciplinarian commanding officer.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Sports drama starring Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall and Nicole Kidman. Cocky racing driver Cole Trickle is revved up to take the stock-car circuit by storm, but his aggressive driving style soon lands him in hospital. There he meets Dr Claire Lewicki, who gives the young driver more than racing to think about.

programme.title: The Lord of the RingsThe Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: Epic fantasy adventure based on the first part of JRR Tolkien's classic trilogy, directed by Peter Jackson, and starring Elijah Wood and Ian McKellen. Frodo, a mild-mannered hobbit, inherits a ring that gives the wearer absolute power. Fearful that Sauron, the dark Lord of Mordor, will steal it, the wizard Gandalf orders Frodo to return the ring to its source where it can be destroyed.

programme.title: The Lord of the RingsThe Two Towers
programme.desc: The second part of Peter Jackson's epic adaptation of JRR Tolkien's classic fantasy adventure, starring Elijah Wood and Ian McKellen. Hobbits Frodo and Sam, now separated from the rest of the fellowship, travel deep into the realm of the evil Lord Sauron to destroy the ring. The pair are guided on their journey by Gollum, but the slimy creature has a sinister reason for wanting to help.

programme.title: The Lord of the Ringsthe Return of the King
programme.desc: The Oscar-winning final part of Peter Jackson's adaptation of JRR Tolkien's fantasy adventure. The hobbit Frodo continues his journey to destroy the ring before the evil Lord Sauron can seize it. He is accompanied deep into Mordor by Gollum, who has a darker motive for keeping the "precious" ring close.

programme.title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Fantasy based on the classic children's book by Roald Dahl, starring Gene Wilder. Most children, at one hungry time or another, dream of visiting a chocolate factory. For young Charlie Bucket the fantasy comes true when he finds a golden ticket in a candy bar: an invitation to tour the giant factory of eccentric sweet tycoon Willy Wonka.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Spying
programme.desc: Spy spoof starring Kenneth Williams and Barbara Windsor. Chaos ensues when four incompetent British secret agents set out to recover a secret formula stolen by the subversive organisation known as STENCH.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Teacher
programme.desc: Comedy starring Ted Ray and Kenneth Connor. When a Ministry of Education inspector visits Maudlin Street School, the pupils make sure they are on their best misbehaviour so that their headmaster, who has applied for a new job, never leaves them.(n)

programme.title: The Cinema ListUnlikely Heroes
programme.desc: Welcome to The Cinema List, where some of the unlikeliest heroes in film are explored, from a tiny pigeon in Valiant (2005) to a group of loyal toys in Bobbleheads (2020).(n)

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: Oscar-winning western starring John Wayne as one-eyed US marshal "Rooster" Cogburn. When a young girl discovers that her father has been robbed and murdered, she persuades the hard-drinking Cogburn to track down the killer.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the RingsThe Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: Epic fantasy adventure based on the first part of JRR Tolkien's classic trilogy, directed by Peter Jackson, and starring Elijah Wood and Ian McKellen. Frodo, a mild-mannered hobbit, inherits a ring that gives the wearer absolute power. Fearful that Sauron, the dark Lord of Mordor, will steal it, the wizard Gandalf orders Frodo to return the ring to its source where it can be destroyed.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the RingsThe Two Towers
programme.desc: The second part of Peter Jackson's epic adaptation of JRR Tolkien's classic fantasy adventure, starring Elijah Wood and Ian McKellen. Hobbits Frodo and Sam, now separated from the rest of the fellowship, travel deep into the realm of the evil Lord Sauron to destroy the ring. The pair are guided on their journey by Gollum, but the slimy creature has a sinister reason for wanting to help.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Ringsthe Return of the King
programme.desc: The Oscar-winning final part of Peter Jackson's adaptation of JRR Tolkien's fantasy adventure. The hobbit Frodo continues his journey to destroy the ring before the evil Lord Sauron can seize it. He is accompanied deep into Mordor by Gollum, who has a darker motive for keeping the "precious" ring close.(n)

programme.title: The Cinema ListUnlikely Heroes
programme.desc: Welcome to The Cinema List, where some of the unlikeliest heroes in film are explored, from a tiny pigeon in Valiant (2005) to a group of loyal toys in Bobbleheads (2020).(n)

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: Second World War drama starring Brad Pitt, Logan Lerman and Shia LaBeouf. In the final days of the conflict, a young tank driver gets a baptism of fire when he joins a battle-hardened crew led by the uncompromising "Wardaddy".(n)

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Second World War drama directed by Steven Spielberg and starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore and Edward Burns, and featuring Matt Damon. As the horror of the Normandy landings takes its toll, three brothers lie dead. Captain Miller is sent on a special mission in occupied France to bring home the fourth brother, Private Ryan - no matter what the cost.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Russell Crowe. Maths genius John Forbes Nash Jr battles paranoid schizophrenia, suffering delusions that threaten to derail his academic career and his marriage, before eventually having the opportunity to win an economics Nobel Prize.(n)

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Mickey Kelley, a former Marine and one of the first American black belts in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, gets pulled away from everything he loves and into an unsanctioned MMA tournament. Sporting drama, starring Sean Patrick Flanery, Katrina Bowden and Dennis Quaid.

programme.title: Resident EvilDamnation
programme.desc: Animated action horror based on the video-game series. A special agent investigates the use of biological weapons in a European civil war.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: After a street preacher believes the world is going to end via an electrical storm, Kurt, a combat veteran suffering from PTSD, builds a secret underground shelter beneath his cramped apartment. He pays for it with a a job at a shady security firm, where he soon begins a romance with the boss' daughter. Drama, starring Hayden Christensen, Harvey Keitel and Liz Solari.

programme.title: Resident EvilVendetta
programme.desc: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York. Animated sci-fi horror, with the voices of Kevin Dorman, Matthew Mercer and Erin Cahill.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: A quiet and unassuming family man slowly reveals his true character after his house is burgled by two petty thieves. The aftermath of the incident ignites his long-simmering rage, triggering dormant instincts and propelling him on a brutal path that brings to the surface dark secrets and lethal skills. Crime drama, starring Bob Odenkirk, Connie Nielsen and Aleksey Serebryakov.

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Zoë Saldana, Jeffrey Dean Morgan and Chris Evans. An elite special ops unit, now presumed dead, sets out for payback against the CIA operative who ordered their termination, before he can put his plan for world domination into effect.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Eddie Murphy. An old friend's murder leads impulsive Detroit detective Axel Foley to glamorous Los Angeles in search of information about the killing. A law unto himself, Foley's streetwise attitude soon makes him enemies among the cops and the crooks.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 9\n
programme.desc: Dom Toretto is leading a quiet life off the grid with Letty and his son, little Brian, but they know that danger always lurks just over their peaceful horizon. His crew must soon join together to stop a world-shattering plot led by the most skilled assassin and high-performance driver they've ever encountered - who also happens to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother, Jakob. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Jordana Brewster and John Cena.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: A quiet and unassuming family man slowly reveals his true character after his house is burgled by two petty thieves. The aftermath of the incident ignites his long-simmering rage, triggering dormant instincts and propelling him on a brutal path that brings to the surface dark secrets and lethal skills. Crime drama, starring Bob Odenkirk, Connie Nielsen and Aleksey Serebryakov.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Action fantasy concluding Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy, starring Christian Bale, Tom Hardy and Anne Hathaway. There has been no sign of Batman in Gotham City since the defeat of the Joker eight years earlier. Bruce Wayne has become a recluse, but he is forced to abandon his seclusion and don cape and cowl once more when merciless terrorist Bane threatens the city with annihilation.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Noomi Rapace and Colin Farrell. A man who infiltrates a ruthless gang to seek retribution for the murder of his family is forced into an uneasy relationship with a woman hellbent on a revenge mission of her own.

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Zoë Saldana, Jeffrey Dean Morgan and Chris Evans. An elite special ops unit, now presumed dead, sets out for payback against the CIA operative who ordered their termination, before he can put his plan for world domination into effect.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: During a picturesque summer on the Nantucket coast, Niko and Tillie are living the dream of a summer romance. However, when his terrorist brother comes to the United States, Niko must pit himself against his own family in order to protect the woman he loves and thousands of innocent people. Action thriller, starring KJ Apa, Scott Adkins and India Eisley.

programme.title: Resident EvilVendetta
programme.desc: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York. Animated sci-fi horror, with the voices of Kevin Dorman, Matthew Mercer and Erin Cahill.

programme.title: Narco Soldiers
programme.desc: A soldier in a Caribbean drug gang and his lover rise to power by instigating a turf war between cartels. However, when enemy forces come for revenge, the couple discover a fast way to wealth and power may also be a quick way to end up dead. Director Felix Limardo's crime thriller, starring Rafael Amaya, Carolina Guerra and Octavio Pizano.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A covert security company called Vanguard is the last hope of survival for an accountant after he is targeted by the world's deadliest mercenary organisation. Director Stanley Tong's action comedy thriller, starring Jackie Chan, Yang Yang and Lun Ai.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: MMA fighter Cole Young embarks on a quest to seek out Earth's greatest champions, in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe. Fantasy action adventure based on the video game series, starring Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson and Joe Taslim.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: Action crime thriller starring Tom Cruise. When five innocent people are gunned down in Pittsburgh, all evidence points to former US Army sniper James Barr. However, Barr refuses to confess to the crime, and sends out word for ex-military investigator Jack Reacher to clear his name. Despite being no friend of Barr's, Reacher looks into the murders and discovers the victims may not have been so randomly selected after all.

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: Nero, a former Special Forces agent, has moved to a quiet beach town to raise his son, leaving his past life behind - until he is rudely awakened by a phone call telling him that his son has been kidnapped. In order to see his son alive again, Nero must wipe out three dangerous crime syndicates of highly-skilled criminals, but he has to work alone and face increasing obstacles and levels of weaponry to uncover the identity of the man behind the macabre plot. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins and Mario Van Peebles.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Action fantasy concluding Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy, starring Christian Bale, Tom Hardy and Anne Hathaway. There has been no sign of Batman in Gotham City since the defeat of the Joker eight years earlier. However, Barr refuses to confess to the crime, and sends out word for ex-military investigator Jack Reacher to clear his name. Despite being no friend of Barr's, Reacher looks into the murders and discovers the victims may not have been so randomly selected after all.

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Crime drama from the director of Training Day, starring Richard Gere, Ethan Hawke and Don Cheadle. The lives of three New York City policemen - a bitter veteran in his last week on the job; a cop who's desperate to raise money to have a better family life; and an undercover agent who wants a transfer to an office job - intertwine when they all end up at the same fateful location.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: MMA fighter Cole Young embarks on a quest to seek out Earth's greatest champions, in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe. Fantasy action adventure based on the video game series, starring Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson and Joe Taslim.

Director Felix Limardo's crime thriller, starring Rafael Amaya, Carolina Guerra and Octavio Pizano.

programme.title: Archenemy
programme.desc: A man named Max Fist claims to be a hero from another dimension who fell through time and space to Earth, where he has no powers. No one believes his stories, except for a local teen named Hamster. Action adventure, starring Joe Manganiello, Skylan Brooks, Jessica Allain and Mac Brandt.

programme.title: Take Back
programme.desc: Couple Zara and Brian's perfect small-town life is turned upside-down when a mysterious stranger from Zara's secret past kidnaps their daughter, and they must embark on a mission to save her life. Action thriller inspired by true events, starring Mickey Rourke, Michael Jai White and Gillian White.

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Kevin Costner, Amber Heard and Hailee Steinfeld. While trying to bond with his estranged daughter, terminally ill CIA agent Ethan Renner reluctantly agrees to one last job in exchange for an experimental drug that could save his life.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: Disaster action thriller starring Dwayne Johnson. An LA Fire Department helicopter pilot embarks on a desperate mission to save his family in the aftermath of a devastating California earthquake.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: An elite squad of Navy SEALs, on a covert mission to transport a prisoner off a CIA black site island prison, are trapped when insurgents attack while trying to rescue the same prisoner. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Ashley Greene and Ryan Phillippe.

programme.title: The Four Feathers
programme.desc: Period adventure starring Heath Ledger, Wes Bentley and Kate Hudson. In 1888, Harry Feversham, a young officer in the British Army, resigns his commission instead of joining the war campaign in the Sudan. Branded a coward by his family and friends, Feversham sets out on a dangerous undercover mission to clear his name and win back his fiancée.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Fantasy horror based on the Marvel comic, starring Nicolas Cage and Eva Mendes. Teenage stunt rider Johnny Blaze sells his soul to the Devil in return for the life of his terminally ill father. Years later, his alter ego Ghost Rider is still reluctantly locked into a pact with Satan to bring evil souls to Hell. Then an encounter with his former sweetheart makes Blaze determined to break free and regain a normal life.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: Disaster action thriller starring Dwayne Johnson. An LA Fire Department helicopter pilot embarks on a desperate mission to save his family in the aftermath of a devastating California earthquake.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger. A prison designer is framed for a crime and finds himself incarcerated in a state-of-the-art penitentiary that he designed himself.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: An elite squad of Navy SEALs, on a covert mission to transport a prisoner off a CIA black site island prison, are trapped when insurgents attack while trying to rescue the same prisoner. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Ashley Greene and Ryan Phillippe.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: Cartographer Jonathan Green, last seen in 2014's The Forbidden Kingdom, heads off on a supernatural journey to the Far East. Director Oleg Stepchenko's action adventure, starring Jason Flemyng, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jackie Chan, Charles Dance, and in one of his final screen appearances, Rutger Hauer.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Fantasy horror based on the Marvel comic, starring Nicolas Cage and Eva Mendes. Teenage stunt rider Johnny Blaze sells his soul to the Devil in return for the life of his terminally ill father. Years later, his alter ego Ghost Rider is still reluctantly locked into a pact with Satan to bring evil souls to Hell. Then an encounter with his former sweetheart makes Blaze determined to break free and regain a normal life.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Mark Wahlberg. US Army sniper Bob Lee Swagger has become a recluse after narrowly escaping death during a failed mission in Ethiopia. Persuaded out of retirement by a former colleague to help foil a plot to assassinate the US President, Swagger is horrified to discover that he's been set up as a patsy for the crime and is forced to go on the run.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure starring Logan Lerman, Matthew Macfadyen and Milla Jovovich. A trio of legendary swordsmen are joined by the reckless young D'Artagnan in a bid to stop a beautiful but devious woman plunging France into war.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger. A prison designer is framed for a crime and finds himself incarcerated in a state-of-the-art penitentiary that he designed himself.

programme.title: Battle Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Aaron Eckhart and Michelle Rodriguez. A worldwide meteor storm turns out to be an alien invasion that targets major cities. Staff Sergeant Michael Nantz finds himself leading a ragtag bunch of US Marines in a battle to save Los Angeles.

programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting US citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Aidan Quinn and Taylor John Smith.

programme.title: The HuntsmanWinter's War
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron. Elite huntsman Eric falls for fellow warrior Sara as the battle for dominance between two powerful queens escalates.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Mark Wahlberg. US Army sniper Bob Lee Swagger has become a recluse after narrowly escaping death during a failed mission in Ethiopia. Persuaded out of retirement by a former colleague to help foil a plot to assassinate the US President, Swagger is horrified to discover that he's been set up as a patsy for the crime and is forced to go on the run.

programme.title: A Walk among the Tombstones
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Liam Neeson. Former NYPD cop Matt Scudder is, at first, reluctant to take the job of hunting down a gang that kidnapped and ransomed the wife of a wealthy drug dealer. But when it becomes clear these ruthless perpetrators will strike again, Scudder realises they must be stopped.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Action crime thriller based on the Marvel comic, starring Tom Jane, John Travolta, Will Patton and Rebecca Romijn-Stamos. Undercover FBI special agent Frank Castle agrees to one final operation before retiring, but it all goes wrong when Florida gangster Howard Saint's son is killed in the process. Swearing revenge for his child, Saint orders the murder of Castle and his entire family. But Castle survives, and sets out to destroy every aspect of Saint's life.(n)

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure starring Logan Lerman, Matthew Macfadyen and Milla Jovovich. A trio of legendary swordsmen are joined by the reckless young D'Artagnan in a bid to stop a beautiful but devious woman plunging France into war.(n)

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owen's update to Charles Dickens' Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay.(n)

programme.title: The Paper Tigers
programme.desc: Three kung-fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men, now one kick away from pulling their hamstrings. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death. Action comedy, starring Andy Le, Jae Suh Park and Yuji Okumoto.(n)

programme.title: First Knight
programme.desc: Adventure starring Sean Connery and Richard Gere. King Arthur's peaceful Camelot kingdom is plagued by the villainous intentions of Prince Malagant. But help is at hand from the dashing Lancelot.(n)

programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting US citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Aidan Quinn and Taylor John Smith.(n)
