Former NYPD cop Matt Scudder is, at first, reluctant to take the job of hunting down a gang that kidnapped and ransomed the wife of a wealthy drug dealer. But when it becomes clear these ruthless perpetrators will strike again, Scudder realises they must be stopped.(n)

programme.title: 300Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Ruler of the Persian empire and self-proclaimed god Xerxes continues his campaign to crush the emerging Greek nation, forcing a general from the democratic city state of Athens to lead his navy into battle against Xerxes' vast armada. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green and Lena Headey.(n)

programme.title: VenomLet There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams.(n)

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Iko Uwais and Joe Taslim. Trapped inside an apartment building run by a ruthless drugs lord, a crack team of police are forced to fight their way out.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee 3the Golden Orb
programme.desc: When the headstrong little bee and her best friend Willi rescue an ant princess, they find themselves in the middle of an epic bug battle that takes them to strange new worlds and tests their friendship to its limits. Animated adventure, with the voice of Coco Jack Gillies.

programme.title: Norm of the NorthKing Sized Adventure
programme.desc: An ancient Chinese artefact is stolen by a villainous archaeologist named Dexter. With the help of his lemming friends, Norm must keep his word and embark on a journey across the world to help recover the item for the people of China. Animated family comedy, with the voices of Andrew Toth, Lisa Durupt and Jonathan Holmes.

programme.title: Duck Duck Goose
programme.desc: A carefree goose strikes up an unlikely bond with two young ducklings he rescues while fleeing his flock for an independent life. Animation with Zendaya and Stephen Fry.

programme.title: Tom & JerrySanta's Little Helpers
programme.desc: Merry mayhem ensues until the destructive duo decide to put their differences aside and work as a team in order to save Christmas. Animated short.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Animated action comedy featuring the voices of Shia LaBeouf and Jeff Bridges. Rockhopper penguin Cody Maverick is determined to win the "Big Z Memorial Surf Off", an event named after the surfing legend he has idolised since childhood.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure with the voices of Emma Stone, Ryan Reynolds and Nicolas Cage. A prehistoric family are made homeless by an earthquake and are forced to trek through hostile territory in search of a new cave, encountering weird and wonderful wildlife en route.

programme.title: SinbadLegend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: Animated action adventure featuring the voices of Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Michelle Pfeiffer and Joseph Fiennes. When seafaring rogue Sinbad is framed by the goddess of chaos for stealing the Book of Peace, one of the world's most powerful treasures, his best friend Proteus volunteers to die in his place. The only way to stop the execution is to retrieve the book, but will cowardly Sinbad be prepared to embark on such a perilous journey into the unknown?

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Musical animated adventure featuring the voices of Nicole Kidman, Elijah Wood and Robin Williams. In the freezing Antarctic, Emperor penguins find their soul mate through their own unique "heart song". Unfortunately for young bird Mumble, he can't sing a note, but he can tap dance brilliantly. Social rejection soon follows, leading his "happy feet" to be blamed for a colony-threatening fish famine. Determined to prove his worth, Mumble heads off on a perilous journey to discover the truth about what has happened to the fish stocks.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Musical animated adventure sequel featuring the voice of Elijah Wood. Mumble and his son Erik must rescue their friends and family in the aftermath of a natural disaster.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Elle Fanning, Isaac Hempstead-Wright and Ben Kingsley. A young orphan raised by quirky underground creatures joins them in a fight against an evil exterminator.

programme.title: The Croods 2a New Age
programme.desc: Still searching for a place to settle down, prehistoric patriarch Grug leads his family to the great unknown. Hoping for the best in an increasingly dangerous world, while trying to come to terms with Eep and Guy's budding romance, Grug stumbles upon a secluded Eden of plenty, containing everything that they have been seeking. However, there is a catch. This area is already occupied by the significantly more evolved Bettermans - Phil, Hope and their daughter Dawn. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone and Ryan Reynolds.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Misguided inventor Flint Lockwood creates a machine that can turn water into food. But what initially seems like the answer to his community's economic crisis soon begins to cause some unexpected problems.

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: Animated fantasy based on the book by Neil Gaiman, featuring the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher. A little girl finds a hidden door that leads to an eerie parallel world where her "Other Mother" lavishes her with attention, but she soon feels stifled and wants to go home.

programme.title: Mosley
programme.desc: A species of creatures known as `thoriphants" rebel against their life of servitude and embark on a treacherous journey to find the fabled city of Uprights. Animated family adventure, with the voices of Lucy Lawless, John Rhys-Davies and Temuera Morrison.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Return To Zombie Island
programme.desc: Now reluctantly retired from crime-solving, the gang's spirits are lifted when Shaggy wins a trip to an island tropical paradise, inviting this friends along. However, he and Scooby-Doo make Fred, Velma and Daphne promise that they will properly relax and not attempt to solve any more mysteries. Animated adventure, with the voices of Matthew Lillard, Frank Welker, Grey Griffin and Kate Micucci.

programme.title: SinbadLegend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: Animated action adventure featuring the voices of Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Michelle Pfeiffer and Joseph Fiennes. When seafaring rogue Sinbad is framed by the goddess of chaos for stealing the Book of Peace, one of the world's most powerful treasures, his best friend Proteus volunteers to die in his place. The only way to stop the execution is to retrieve the book, but will cowardly Sinbad be prepared to embark on such a perilous journey into the unknown?

programme.title: Norm of the NorthFamily Vacation
programme.desc: Overwhelmed with his Kingly duties, Norm struggles to make time for both his kingdom and his family. When his crown is mysteriously stolen, he must embark on a journey to not only find the crown, but to also repair his relationship with his family. Animated family comedy, with the voices of Andrew Toth, Lisa Durupt and Jonathan Holmes.

programme.title: The House of Magic
programme.desc: Animated adventure. An abandoned cat seeking shelter from a storm stumbles into a strange house owned by an old magician.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2
programme.desc: When Bodi and his band True Blue leave Snow Mountain to tour with pop sensation Lil' Foxy, they learn that fame comes at a price. Animated comedy, with the voices of Graham Hamilton, Kathleen Barr, Michael Adamthwaite and Ashleigh Ball.

programme.title: The Croods 2a New Age
programme.desc: Still searching for a place to settle down, prehistoric patriarch Grug leads his family to the great unknown. Hoping for the best in an increasingly dangerous world, while trying to come to terms with Eep and Guy's budding romance, Grug stumbles upon a secluded Eden of plenty, containing everything that they have been seeking. However, there is a catch. This area is already occupied by the significantly more evolved Bettermans - Phil, Hope and their daughter Dawn. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone and Ryan Reynolds.

programme.title: SamSam
programme.desc: SamSam seems to have it all - a loving family, great friends, and even his own flying saucer. However, he's still trying to find one thing that will make his life even better - actual superpowers. Animated adventure, with the voice of Isaac Lobé-Lebel.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Misguided inventor Flint Lockwood creates a machine that can turn water into food. But what initially seems like the answer to his community's economic crisis soon begins to cause some unexpected problems.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure, featuring the voices of Ty Burrell and Max Charles. Super-intelligent dog Mr Peabody and his adopted boy Sherman use their time machine to experience great moments in history. However, when the boy takes fellow student Penny back in time and causes a rift, it's up to his canine mentor to rescue them both before her parents realise she's missing.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure from Aardman. Shaun's plan to have a lazy day on Mossy Bottom Farm backfires when a cunning ruse sees the Farmer end up lost in the Big City. Shaun and the flock set off to find him, but to succeed they will have to avoid capture by an eager animal control officer, with nothing but elaborate disguises and quick wits.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of George Clooney, Meryl Streep and Bill Murray. Following the birth of their son, Mr Fox agrees to keep his word to his wife that his wild days are behind him. But when the family moves to a new home overlooking the farms of Boggis, Bunce and Bean, Mr Fox is tempted to resume his old poaching ways.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Flint Lockwood's mutating machine is no longer turning water into food but producing food/animal hybrids, or foodimals, which very quickly overrun his home town.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence and Ashton Kutcher. In a tranquil mountain town, domesticated grizzly bear Boog enjoys an idyllic life as the star of a wildlife show. But when he meets hyperactive deer Elliot, he gets into so much trouble that his keeper decides it's time to release him back into the wild. Problem is, hunting season is fast approaching and there's a tenacious hunter who's determined to bag both Boog and Elliot.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Tulio and Miguel, two small-time Spanish tricksters, get their hands on a map to El Dorado, the legendary city of gold. After inadvertently stowing away aboard a Mexico-bound ship captained by the famous conquistador Cortes, they find themselves washed up on the shores of the Americas with a horse named Altivo and head off to find the fabled lost city.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Will Ferrell and Drew Barrymore. When museum guide Ted learns that his workplace faces closure, he travels to Africa to locate an idol for a fantastic new exhibition. But things don't quite go to plan, especially when a monkey he befriends stows away and follows him back to the big city...

programme.title: Igor
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of John Cusack, John Cleese and Steve Buscemi. Igor, a hunchbacked but highly intelligent lab assistant dreams of becoming a mad scientist like his master, hoping to win the annual Evil Science Fair with the scariest monster ever created.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Flummels are an extinct species of rabbit-like creatures with holes in their centre. One day two of the fluffy animals find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. Animated adventure from the makers of The Simpsons Movie, featuring the voices of Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom and Ken Jeong.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence and Ashton Kutcher. In a tranquil mountain town, domesticated grizzly bear Boog enjoys an idyllic life as the star of a wildlife show. But when he meets hyperactive deer Elliot, he gets into so much trouble that his keeper decides it's time to release him back into the wild. Problem is, hunting season is fast approaching and there's a tenacious hunter who's determined to bag both Boog and Elliot.

programme.title: The Elfkins
programme.desc: The legendary Elfkins of Cologne, gnomes who secretly helped craftsmen at night until they were ousted by a tailor's malevolent wife 200 years ago, make their return. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jella Haase, Louis Hofmann and Leon Seidel.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: Animated horror comedy featuing the voices of Emily Watson, Nick Frost Jason Isaacs and Jessica Brown Findlay. A witch's curse transforms an dysfunctional family into monsters: Mum becomes a vampire, Dad a Frankenstein's monster and the children a mummy and a werewolf. The family must work together to find the witch and reverse the curse.

programme.title: Monster Family 2
programme.desc: Baba Yaga and Renfield are captured by a monster hunter, so the Wishbone family once again transform into a vampire, Frankenstein's monster, a mummy and a werewolf in a bid to free them. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure from Aardman. Shaun's plan to have a lazy day on Mossy Bottom Farm backfires when a cunning ruse sees the Farmer end up lost in the Big City. Shaun and the flock set off to find him, but to succeed they will have to avoid capture by an eager animal control officer, with nothing but elaborate disguises and quick wits.

programme.title: Lego DC Super Hero GirlsSuper-Villain High
programme.desc: Wonder Woman, Harley Quinn, Poison Ivy, Supergirl, Batgirl, Katana, and Bumblebee come together to help those that are being used by a new school to commit crimes. Animated adventure, with the voices of Yvette Nicole Brown, Greg Cipes and Romi Dames.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Flint Lockwood's mutating machine is no longer turning water into food but producing food/animal hybrids, or foodimals, which very quickly overrun his home town.

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: Young Dug's sheltered life with his Stone Age tribe is shattered by bronze-mining invaders led by greedy Lord Nooth. To win his home back, desperate Dug gambles on challenging these more sophisticated folk in a contest they love, but he only knows from rock paintings - football. Director Nick Park's animated adventure, with the voices of Eddie Redmayne, Timothy Spall, Rob Brydon, Miriam Margolyes and Johnny Vegas.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In 1930, 16-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the world's first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. Georgia's father is called out of retirement by the Mayor to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save the city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called Joe and joins a group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist. Animated adventure, with the voices of Olivia Cooke and Kenneth Branagh.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Animated comedy horror featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Selena Gomez and Andy Samberg. Exhausted from running the hotel, Count Dracula heads off on a sea cruise with the family. Romance beckons in the form of the ship's mysterious captain - but she is hiding a deadly secret that could spell disaster for the monsters.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voice of Sandra Bullock. The film charts the history of the diminutive yellow sidekicks as they seek to serve the biggest villains around - everyone from Dracula to Napoleon, all the way up to their introduction to Gru, their evil leader in Despicable Me.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure sequel. Elliott the deer puts his marriage plans on hold to help organise the rescue of Mr Weenie the dachshund, who has been dognapped.

programme.title: SpiritStallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: Animated western, featuring the voice of Matt Damon. In the Old West of the late-19th century, a wild mustang called Spirit is captured and sold to a cavalry regiment. Now at the mercy of the regiment's harsh colonel, Spirit vows not to be broken.

programme.title: Curious George 2Follow That Monkey!
programme.desc: Animated adventure in which cheeky monkey George tries to reunite a baby circus elephant with her family in California. But his kind deed isn't seen as such by everyone.

programme.title: Mary and the Witch's Flower
programme.desc: A strange flower grants a girl magic powers. Animated adventure based on The Little Broomstick by Mary Stewart, featuring the voices of Kate Winslet and Jim Broadbent. Dubbed in English.

programme.title: Okko's Inn
programme.desc: After losing her parents in a car accident, Okko goes to live in the countryside with her grandmother, who runs a traditional Japanese inn built on top of an ancient spring said to have healing waters. Kitaro Kosaka's animated fantasy, featuring the voices Seiran Kobayashi, Nana Mizuki, Satsumi Matsuda.

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super HeroesAquamanRage of Atlantis
programme.desc: Aquaman must battle foes in the air, on land and in the depths of the Seven Seas, to save the day. Animated family adventure, with the voice of Dee Bradley Baker.

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Looking for a new home, the Oggly family end up in the beautiful, peaceful village of Smelliville when Firebottom, the family dragon, crash-lands on a run-down rubbish tip. Unfortunately, Smelliville has a stinky problem - the dump is spoiling the place, and something must be done. Animated family adventure, with the voice of Ben Young.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Animated comedy horror featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Selena Gomez and Andy Samberg. Exhausted from running the hotel, Count Dracula heads off on a sea cruise with the family. Romance beckons in the form of the ship's mysterious captain - but she is hiding a deadly secret that could spell disaster for the monsters.

programme.title: Valiant
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, John Cleese and Tim Curry. In May 1944, a small but courageous wood pigeon called Valiant does his bit for the war effort by joining the Royal Homing Pigeon Service. But the RHPS is suffering heavy losses owing to the ruthless Nazi falcon brigade under General Von Talen, and Valiant's squad is interrupted in its training and sent on a special mission.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In 1930, 16-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the world's first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. Georgia's father is called out of retirement by the Mayor to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save the city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called Joe and joins a group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist. Animated adventure, with the voices of Olivia Cooke and Kenneth Branagh.

programme.title: BobbleheadsThe Movie
programme.desc: When the toys' humans go AWOL, they must defend their home from unexpected guests, two uninvited intruders who hope to swap a new baseball player bobblehead for a valuable one. Family animation, with the voices of Cher, Jennifer Coolidge and Anthony DeStefanis.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voice of Sandra Bullock. The film charts the history of the diminutive yellow sidekicks as they seek to serve the biggest villains around - everyone from Dracula to Napoleon, all the way up to their introduction to Gru, their evil leader in Despicable Me.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: Animated fantasy adventure featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage and Meryl Streep. A wizard ant conjures up a potion that miniaturises ten-year-old Lucas, the boy who attacked his suburban ant hill home. Forced to earn his freedom by living in the ant community, Lucas helps the insects to stop a pest controller from destroying their colony.

programme.title: The Lego Movie
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Will Ferrell and Chris Pratt. When the evil Lord Business attempts to take over the Lego world using a mystical super-weapon called the Kragle, it falls to an unlikely hero, construction worker Emmet, to save the day.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler. A teenage Viking boy forms a special bond with a dragon - much to the consternation of the members of his clan who regard the beasts as mortal enemies.

programme.title: Riverdancethe Animated Adventure
programme.desc: Animated fantasy featuring the voices of Sam Hardy, Hannah Herman Cortes, Pierce Brosnan and Brendan Gleeson. Struggling to cope with the death of his beloved granddad, young Keegan accompanies his friend Moya to a land of mythical beings whose dancing keeps the rivers flowing and who have much to teach their young visitors.

programme.title: Valiant
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, John Cleese and Tim Curry. In May 1944, a small but courageous wood pigeon called Valiant does his bit for the war effort by joining the Royal Homing Pigeon Service. But the RHPS is suffering heavy losses owing to the ruthless Nazi falcon brigade under General Von Talen, and Valiant's squad is interrupted in its training and sent on a special mission.

programme.title: Curious George 3Back to the Jungle
programme.desc: The monkey crash lands in Africa after a space mission does not go to plan. Animated adventure, with the voices of John Goodman, Frank Welker, Jeff Bennett and Gwendoline Yeo.

programme.title: BobbleheadsThe Movie
programme.desc: When the toys' humans go AWOL, they must defend their home from unexpected guests, two uninvited intruders who hope to swap a new baseball player bobblehead for a valuable one. Family animation, with the voices of Cher, Jennifer Coolidge and Anthony DeStefanis.(n)

programme.title: The Magic Roundabout
programme.desc: Animated adventure, based on the children's TV classic, featuring the voices of Robbie Williams, Bill Nighy, Ian McKellen and Kylie Minogue. On a manic hunt for sugar, Dougal the dog inadvertently releases evil sorcerer Zeebad from his prison beneath the roundabout. Free after centuries, the malevolent creature aims to cast the world into darkness, but first he has to capture three magic diamonds. Can Dougal and his pals stop Zeebad's wicked plans by getting to the gems first?(n)

programme.title: BarbieStar Light Adventure
programme.desc: The princess of an alien world leaves her home for the first time on a very important journey. The stars that surround the planet are beginning to fade, and she must join a group of talented individuals to journey into space and restore their light. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Erica Lindbeck and Robbie Daymond.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A silver dragon named Firedrake and his friends search for a mythical safe haven hidden in the Himalayas. Animated family adventure based on the novel by Cornelia Funke, featuring the voices of Felicity Jones, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Patrick Stewart and Freddie Highmore.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure, featuring the voices of Ty Burrell and Max Charles. Super-intelligent dog Mr Peabody and his adopted boy Sherman use their time machine to experience great moments in history. However, when the boy takes fellow student Penny back in time and causes a rift, it's up to his canine mentor to rescue them both before her parents realise she's missing.(n)

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: Animated fantasy adventure featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage and Meryl Streep. A wizard ant conjures up a potion that miniaturises ten-year-old Lucas, the boy who attacked his suburban ant hill home. Forced to earn his freedom by living in the ant community, Lucas helps the insects to stop a pest controller from destroying their colony.(n)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler. A teenage Viking boy forms a special bond with a dragon - much to the consternation of the members of his clan who regard the beasts as mortal enemies.(n)

programme.title: Igor
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of John Cusack, John Cleese and Steve Buscemi. Igor, a hunchbacked but highly intelligent lab assistant dreams of becoming a mad scientist like his master, hoping to win the annual Evil Science Fair with the scariest monster ever created.(n)

programme.title: The Lego Movie
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Will Ferrell and Chris Pratt. When the evil Lord Business attempts to take over the Lego world using a mystical super-weapon called the Kragle, it falls to an unlikely hero, construction worker Emmet, to save the day.(n)

programme.title: Farmageddon
programme.desc: When an alien with amazing powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the intergalactic visitor home before a sinister organisation can capture her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Justin Fletcher, John Sparkes and Amalia Vitale.(n)

programme.title: Gnomeo & Juliet
programme.desc: Animated romantic tale with the voices of James McAvoy and Emily Blunt. Gnomeo and Juliet live in neighbouring gardens but are caught up in a bitter battle between rival gnome factions. Will love be able to overcome the obstacles in their path?(n)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler and Cate Blanchett. After five years during which time the Vikings and dragons have learned to live together, Hiccup discovers there's a threat to that peaceful status quo that needs to be faced.(n)

programme.title: Over The Hedge
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling and Steve Carell. When Vincent the bear wakes from his winter hibernation to find that scheming raccoon RJ has stolen his stash of food, he gives RJ a deadline to return it, or else. After duping a bunch of animals into helping him, the desperate RJ discovers that part of the forest has been turned into a suburb, and there's a massive hedge separating him from a potentially rich source of salvation.(n)

programme.title: The Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: Animated comedy spin-off from Madagascar, featuring the guest voices of John Malkovich and Benedict Cumberbatch. Resourceful penguins Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico team up with an undercover organisation to stop a malevolent mollusc from destroying the world.(n)

programme.title: Curious GeorgeRoyal Monkey
programme.desc: Animated adventure in which George trades places with the king's monkey, Philippe. While Philippe puzzles Ted with his flawless manners, George travels to the castle where his fun-loving antics raise eyebrows and bring shy Princess Isabel out of her shell. With the voices of Frank Welker, Jeff Bennett and Daniela Bobadilla.(n)

programme.title: Kajillionaire
programme.desc: Two con artists have spent 26 years training their only daughter to swindle, scam and steal at every turn. During a desperate and hastily conceived heist, they charm a stranger into joining them, only to have their entire world turned upside down. Comedy drama, starring Evan Rachel Wood, Debra Winger and Richard Jenkins.

programme.title: Think like a Man
programme.desc: Four women take the advice of a self-help book on how to control their boyfriends, and are impressed with the results. However, the men also manage to get hold of a copy and conspire to use their inside knowledge to turn the tables. Comedy drama, with Michael Ealy, Taraji P Henson, Jerry Ferrera and Gabrielle Union.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.

programme.title: Locked Down
programme.desc: Ex-con Paxton lives in London during the coronavirus lockdown with his American girlfriend Linda. Paxton is furloughed from his job as a delivery van driver, while Linda has the unfortunate task of announcing compulsory redundancies to her staff via Zoom. In the midst of their downward spiral, Paxton and Linda realise their respective jobs will collide on a Saturday night at Harrods, as the department store removes valuable stock from its floors. The couple hatch a daredevil plan to steal the Harris Diamond, worth £3million, and replace it with a replica. Crime comedy, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor and Anne Hathaway.

programme.title: Our Ladies
programme.desc: In 1990s Scotland, a group of Catholic school girls get an opportunity to go into Edinburgh for a choir competition, but they're more interested in drinking, partying and hooking up than winning the competition. Comedy drama, starring Abigail Lawrie, Rona Morison and Marli Siu.

programme.title: People Just Do NothingBig in Japan
programme.desc: After Brentford's largest pirate radio station has ended, the boys from Kurupt FM find their way to Japan on an epic adventure in search of fame and fortune. But is Japan really ready for Kurupt FM? Comedy based on the BBC series, starring Allan Mustafa, Steve Stamp and Asim Chaudhry.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Anna Kendrick and Skylar Astin. New girl Beca doesn't care about being popular on campus, but her singing voice makes her the centre of attention when she signs up to become part of the college's all-female a cappella group, the Barden Bellas. Determined to outshine them are their male counterparts, the Treblemakers.

programme.title: The Paper Tigers
programme.desc: Three kung-fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men, now one kick away from pulling their hamstrings. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death. Action comedy, starring Andy Le, Jae Suh Park and Yuji Okumoto.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Comedy drama directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Tom Hanks and Catherine Zeta-Jones. On a visit to the United States from the eastern European state of Krakozhia, Viktor Navorski suddenly finds himself with no legal status after his country falls to a military coup. Without a valid visa or diplomatic status, the hapless Navorski is therefore confined to JFK airport, much to the irritation of US customs official Frank Dixon who is determined to be rid of the unwanted visitor.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson. Having been forcibly disbanded for disgracing themselves, a cappella group the Barden Bellas discover a get-out clause - all they have to do is win an international singing competition in Copenhagen.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Sandra Bullock and Michael Caine. Hard-nosed FBI agent Gracie Hart is about as far removed from a beauty queen as you could find. But when a terrorist threatens the Miss United States beauty contest, she is the only person available to go under cover and thwart the attack. As time ticks away, former pageant consultant Victor Melling is given the unenviable job of transforming Gracie into a plausible contestant.

programme.title: Talladega Nightsthe Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Comedy starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen. Nascar racing champion Ricky Bobby has all the trappings of a successful career: a glamorous wife, a luxury home and a fanatical fanbase. But when French driver Jean Girard threatens Ricky's dominance, he seems ill-equipped to meet the challenge.

programme.title: Come as You Are
programme.desc: Three young men with disabilities hit the road with a jaded nurse driver, heading to a brothel in Montreal catering for people with special needs. Remake of the acclaimed Belgian comedy drama, starring Grant Rosenmeyer, Hayden Szeto, Ravi Patel, Gabourey Sidibe and Janeane Garofalo.

programme.title: People Just Do NothingBig in Japan
programme.desc: After Brentford's largest pirate radio station has ended, the boys from Kurupt FM find their way to Japan on an epic adventure in search of fame and fortune. But is Japan really ready for Kurupt FM? Comedy based on the BBC series, starring Allan Mustafa, Steve Stamp and Asim Chaudhry.

programme.title: Locked Down
programme.desc: Ex-con Paxton lives in London during the coronavirus lockdown with his American girlfriend Linda. Paxton is furloughed from his job as a delivery van driver, while Linda has the unfortunate task of announcing compulsory redundancies to her staff via Zoom. In the midst of their downward spiral, Paxton and Linda realise their respective jobs will collide on a Saturday night at Harrods, as the department store removes valuable stock from its floors. The couple hatch a daredevil plan to steal the Harris Diamond, worth £3million, and replace it with a replica. Crime comedy, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor and Anne Hathaway.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day off
programme.desc: Comedy starring Matthew Broderick. Ferris Bueller is smart, and when he plays truant from high school he does it with style. An illicit trip to downtown Chicago involves girlfriend Sloane, best friend Cameron and Cameron's father's prized red Ferrari. Out to foil Ferris are sister Jeanie and Dean of Students Ed Rooney. Will Ferris's luck run out?

programme.title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
programme.desc: Lucy is a twentysomething art gallery assistant living in New York City, who also happens to be an emotional hoarder. After she gets dumped by her latest boyfriend, Lucy is inspired to create The Broken Hearts Gallery, a pop-up space for the items love has left behind. Word of the gallery spreads, encouraging a movement and a fresh start for all the romantics out there, including Lucy herself. Romantic comedy, starring Geraldine Viswanathan.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: Wartime comedy based on the BBC TV sitcom, starring Toby Jones, Bill Nighy and Catherine Zeta-Jones. England, 1944: when a glamorous reporter is sent to profile the Home Guard of Walmington-on-Sea, it's not long before romance rears its head. Meanwhile, MI5 has reason to believe a German spy is operating in the town...

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson. Having been forcibly disbanded for disgracing themselves, a cappella group the Barden Bellas discover a get-out clause - all they have to do is win an international singing competition in Copenhagen.

programme.title: Talladega Nightsthe Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Comedy starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen. But when French driver Jean Girard threatens Ricky's dominance, he seems ill-equipped to meet the challenge.

But when a terrorist threatens the Miss United States beauty contest, she is the only person available to go under cover and thwart the attack. As time ticks away, former pageant consultant Victor Melling is given the unenviable job of transforming Gracie into a plausible contestant.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Kevin Hart and Ice Cube. Wimpy security guard Ben Barber needs the blessing of his girlfriend's cop brother James before they can marry. In an effort to prove his worth, Ben agrees to ride along on a patrol of Atlanta's mean streets to hunt down a vicious criminal.

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: Satirical comedy starring James Franco, Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen and Jay Baruchel. A celebrity-studded party at James Franco's place is rudely interrupted by the apocalypse. The few surviving guests are forced out of their ego-fuelled showbiz bubble to deal with a lot of hellfire and brimstone, but they may just kill each other before the Devil gets a chance to.

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Crime comedy starring Seth Rogen and James Franco. Stoner Dale Denton witnesses a murder by a crooked cop. In the process of fleeing the scene, Dale drops some of his very rare cannabis, known as "Pineapple Express", which can be traced back to him and his dealer, Saul Silver. Soon the pair find themselves on the run and in the middle of a gang war.

programme.title: That Awkward Moment
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Zac Efron and Imogen Poots. Jason and his buddies make the most of the New York dating scene. But when the girl of Jason's dreams wants him to show a bit more commitment, he must think again about his fancy-free lifestyle.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: Wartime comedy based on the BBC TV sitcom, starring Toby Jones, Bill Nighy and Catherine Zeta-Jones. England, 1944: when a glamorous reporter is sent to profile the Home Guard of Walmington-on-Sea, it's not long before romance rears its head. Meanwhile, MI5 has reason to believe a German spy is operating in the town...

Without a valid visa or diplomatic status, the hapless Navorski is therefore confined to JFK airport, much to the irritation of US customs official Frank Dixon who is determined to be rid of the unwanted visitor.

programme.title: Superintelligence
programme.desc: When an all-powerful AI chooses to study average American Carol Peters, the fate of the world hangs in the balance. As the AI decides whether to enslave, save or destroy humanity, it's up to Carol to prove that people are worth sparing. Sci-fi comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy and Bobby Cannavale, with the voice of James Corden.

programme.title: An American Pickle
programme.desc: A simple Jewish man named Herschel Greenbaum works in a pickle factory in Brooklyn. One day, he falls into a vat of brine and stays there, perfectly preserved, for 100 years. He comes back to life and goes to stay with his great-great-grandson, Ben, in contemporary Brooklyn. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Sarah Snook.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Kevin Hart and Ice Cube. Wimpy security guard Ben Barber needs the blessing of his girlfriend's cop brother James before they can marry. In an effort to prove his worth, Ben agrees to ride along on a patrol of Atlanta's mean streets to hunt down a vicious criminal.

The few surviving guests are forced out of their ego-fuelled showbiz bubble to deal with a lot of hellfire and brimstone, but they may just kill each other before the Devil gets a chance to.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Action comedy sequel starring Ice Cube and Kevin Hart. Now a rookie cop, ex-security guard Ben Barber is still on a mission to impress his future brother-in-law James Payton, so he accompanies the tough detective to Miami on a mission to nail the leader of a drug-smuggling operation.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Comedy starring Breckin Meyer and Seann William Scott. When a videotape showing him in a compromising position with another girl accidentally gets sent to his girlfriend, college student Josh borrows a car and heads off cross country with friends EL and Rubin to intercept it.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Comedy starring Melissa McCarthy and Kristen Bell. Businesswoman Michelle Darnell is released from prison after being found guilty of insider trading and she is determined to rebrand herself as a changed woman. But there are many who are not buying the new image and are unwilling to forget.

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg. A father attempts to reconnect with his son by showing up uninvited at his wedding. But there is an ulterior motive for his visit and it's not just about making amends for his years of poor parenting.

programme.title: An American Pickle
programme.desc: A simple Jewish man named Herschel Greenbaum works in a pickle factory in Brooklyn. One day, he falls into a vat of brine and stays there, perfectly preserved, for 100 years. He comes back to life and goes to stay with his great-great-grandson, Ben, in contemporary Brooklyn. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Sarah Snook.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Comedy drama directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Tom Hanks and Catherine Zeta-Jones. On a visit to the United States from the eastern European state of Krakozhia, Viktor Navorski suddenly finds himself with no legal status after his country falls to a military coup. Without a valid visa or diplomatic status, the hapless Navorski is therefore confined to JFK airport, much to the irritation of US customs official Frank Dixon who is determined to be rid of the unwanted visitor.

programme.title: Superintelligence
programme.desc: When an all-powerful AI chooses to study average American Carol Peters, the fate of the world hangs in the balance. As the AI decides whether to enslave, save or destroy humanity, it's up to Carol to prove that people are worth sparing. Sci-fi comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy and Bobby Cannavale, with the voice of James Corden.

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: In remote Western Australia, estranged brothers Colin and Les are at war. Raising separate flocks of sheep descended from their family's prized bloodline, the two men work side by side, yet are worlds apart. When Les's prize ram is diagnosed with a rare and lethal illness, authorities order a purge of every sheep in the valley. While Colin attempts to stealthily outwit the powers that be, Les opts for angry defiance. Comedy drama, starring Sam Neill and Michael Caton.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: Period comedy adventure starring Steve Coogan and Jackie Chan. Victorian inventor Phileas Fogg is challenged to circumnavigate the globe in eighty days by Lord Kelvin, head of the Royal Academy of Science. Accompanying Fogg on his journey are Passepartout, a man skilled in martial arts and bent on restoring a stolen Jade Buddha to his Chinese village, and French artist Monique.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jim Carrey. Lawyer Fletcher Reede is a compulsive liar. When his deceits lead to him missing his son's birthday party, the boy makes a wish that his dad would find it impossible not to tell the truth. The wish comes magically true - with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Action comedy sequel starring Ice Cube and Kevin Hart. Now a rookie cop, ex-security guard Ben Barber is still on a mission to impress his future brother-in-law James Payton, so he accompanies the tough detective to Miami on a mission to nail the leader of a drug-smuggling operation.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Comedy starring Melissa McCarthy and Kristen Bell. Businesswoman Michelle Darnell is released from prison after being found guilty of insider trading and she is determined to rebrand herself as a changed woman. But there are many who are not buying the new image and are unwilling to forget.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Comedy starring Breckin Meyer and Seann William Scott. When a videotape showing him in a compromising position with another girl accidentally gets sent to his girlfriend, college student Josh borrows a car and heads off cross country with friends EL and Rubin to intercept it.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours
programme.desc: Comedy starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron. New parents Mac and Kelly Radner have a settled life on a quiet street, but are worried that their friends see them as dull. When students move into the house next door, the Radners want to show that they can put up with the fraternity lifestyle, but the level of partying soon puts the neighbours on a war footing.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis. When executive recruiter Jamie convinces LA-based art director Dylan to relocate to the Big Apple, the pair become friends. But having both been through the relationship mill, they are determined not to follow the cosy ways of Hollywood rom-coms and embark on a sex-only relationship. Then Jamie decides she wants to return to dating.

programme.title: Logan Lucky
programme.desc: Comedy caper directed by Steven Soderbergh, starring Channing Tatum, Adam Driver and Daniel Craig. Two down-on-their-luck brothers decide to rob the Charlotte Motor Speedway in North Carolina. In order to pull off the job, they need the help of explosives expert Joe Bang - but first they must break him out of prison.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Comedy starring Kristen Wiig and Rose Byrne. After Lillian announces her engagement, she asks her lifelong pal Annie to be her maid of honour. However, Annie's life is in a mess, and she finds herself losing control over the bachelorette party to Lillian's seemingly perfect new friend Helen.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jim Carrey. Lawyer Fletcher Reede is a compulsive liar. When his deceits lead to him missing his son's birthday party, the boy makes a wish that his dad would find it impossible not to tell the truth. The wish comes magically true - with hilarious consequences.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Salma Hayek. Thirty years after winning a junior basketball championship a group of friends reunite for their old coach's funeral, bringing with them all the baggage and emotional angst of adulthood.(n)

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, David Spade and Kevin James. The four friends who refuse to grow up return, this time finding themselves outdone for juvenile behaviour by a gang of local rich-kid fratboys.(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours
programme.desc: Comedy starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron. New parents Mac and Kelly Radner have a settled life on a quiet street, but are worried that their friends see them as dull. When students move into the house next door, the Radners want to show that they can put up with the fraternity lifestyle, but the level of partying soon puts the neighbours on a war footing.(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Comedy starring Kristen Wiig and Rose Byrne. After Lillian announces her engagement, she asks her lifelong pal Annie to be her maid of honour. However, Annie's life is in a mess, and she finds herself losing control over the bachelorette party to Lillian's seemingly perfect new friend Helen.(n)

programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis. When executive recruiter Jamie convinces LA-based art director Dylan to relocate to the Big Apple, the pair become friends. But having both been through the relationship mill, they are determined not to follow the cosy ways of Hollywood rom-coms and embark on a sex-only relationship. Then Jamie decides she wants to return to dating.(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Rose Byrne. When Mac and Kelly Radner discover that the new folks next door are wilder and more out of control than the last lot, they turn to an unlikely source for help.(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Seth Rogen and Katherine Heigl. Alison Scott's career as a television journalist is going from strength to strength. Out on the town to celebrate a promotion, she ends up in bed with amiable slacker Ben Stone and their one-night stand results in an unexpected pregnancy that turns Alison's world upside down.(n)

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig. In a busy supermarket, sausage Frank dreams of one day making it to the Great Beyond, outside the supermarket walls, and living out his days with his hot-dog-bun girlfriend Brenda. But then a jar of honey mustard returns from the Great Beyond with a warning.(n)

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Comedy starring Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd and Jamie Lee Curtis. Millionaires Mortimer and Randolph Duke create an experiment in human nature by framing their niece's fiancé Louis, a pompous stockbroker, for theft and drug pushing, and replacing him with conman Billy Ray Valentine. Their wager is that Valentine will make good and Louis will turn to crime.(n)

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: Annabelle, a lonely widow, plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever. Director Adriana Trigiani's romantic comedy, written by and starring Kathie Lee Gifford, with Craig Ferguson and Ford Kiernan.

programme.title: Materna
programme.desc: Drama following four New York women who are isolated by city life and separated by class, politics, race and religion, but are bound by a shared hunger for identity and connection. With their futures at stake, their lives are upended by a fateful encounter underground, where their stories of personal transformation become a battle for survival. Starring Kate Lyn Sheil, Jade Eshete and Lindsay Burdge.

programme.title: Once Upon a River
programme.desc: After enduring a series of traumas in rural 1970s Michigan, Native American teenager Margo Crane sets out on an odyssey on the Stark River in search of her estranged mother. It's a trek which introduces her to a world filled with dangers. Director Haroula Rose's drama based on Bonnie Jo Campbell's book of the same name, starring Kenadi DelaCerna, John Ashton and Tatanka Means.

programme.title: The Light between Oceans
programme.desc: Drama based on the novel by ML Stedman, starring Michael Fassbender, Alicia Vikander and Rachel Weisz. First World War veteran Tom Sherbourne and his new wife Isabel are the keepers of a remote lighthouse in Australia. A child is the one thing they need to make their idyllic life complete but their dreams continue to be frustrated, until they discover a baby washed up in an abandoned rowboat.

programme.title: St Elmo's Fire
programme.desc: Drama starring Emilio Estevez, Rob Lowe and Demi Moore. Seven close friends who spent their college years together experience difficulties coming to terms with the realities of adulthood.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford. New York, 1945: in a nightclub, Katie Morosky encounters Hubbell Gardiner, the young man she loved from afar at university. Then, as now, their personalities and goals were very different but in matters of the heart, opposites can attract.

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: Retired sheriff George Blackledge and his horse trainer wife Margaret live on a ranch in 1960s Montana, with their son James, his wife Lorna and their son Jimmy. A freak riding accident takes James' life, and the Blackledges watch helplessly as Lorna eventually marries Donnie, who communicates with his fists. Without warning, Donnie spirits Lorna and three-year-old Jimmy away to his family home in North Dakota. Crime drama, starring Kevin Costner, Diane Lane and Kayli Carter.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Samuel L Jackson. Businessman Ken Carter is recruited to improve the fortunes of a failing high-school basketball team. His exacting standards soon put the players under extreme pressure - both on the court and in the classroom.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Drama adapted by John Irving from his own novel, starring Tobey Maguire, Charlize Theron and Oscar-winning Michael Caine. Having grown up in a New England orphanage under the care of the kindly Dr Larch, young Homer Wells has the opportunity to spread his wings further afield.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale and Amy Adams. Welterweight boxer "Irish" Micky Ward dreams of a shot at the big time, but loyalty to his dysfunctional family - particularly Dicky, his drug-addicted half-brother and coach - threatens to block his path to greatness.

programme.title: Rare Beasts
programme.desc: Mandy, a career-driven single mother, juggles raising a son in the midst of a female revolution, mining the pain of her parents' separation, and professionally writing about a love that no longer exists. One day, she meets and falls in love with a troubled man, Pete, who is searching for a sense of worth and belonging. Romantic comedy drama, directed by and starring Billie Piper, with Leo Bill and Kerry Fox.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: Annabelle, a lonely widow, plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever. Director Adriana Trigiani's romantic comedy, written by and starring Kathie Lee Gifford, with Craig Ferguson and Ford Kiernan.

programme.title: My New York Year
programme.desc: In New York City in the late 1990s, a young aspiring writer lands a clerical job at the literary agency of the renowned yet reclusive JD Salinger. While her eccentric and old-fashioned boss tasks her to process Salinger's voluminous fan mail, she struggles to find her own voice. Drama, starring Margaret Qualley and Sigourney Weaver.

programme.title: Once Upon a River
programme.desc: After enduring a series of traumas in rural 1970s Michigan, Native American teenager Margo Crane sets out on an odyssey on the Stark River in search of her estranged mother. It's a trek which introduces her to a world filled with dangers. Director Haroula Rose's drama based on Bonnie Jo Campbell's book of the same name, starring Kenadi DelaCerna, John Ashton and Tatanka Means.

programme.title: The Surrogate
programme.desc: A web designer is ecstatic to be the surrogate and egg donor for her best friend and his husband. However, 12 weeks into the pregnancy, a prenatal test comes back with unexpected results that pose a moral dilemma. Drama, starring Jasmine Batchelor, Chris Perfetti and Sullivan Jones.

programme.title: Clemency
programme.desc: American prison warden Bernadine Williams has presided over a dozen executions. However, as the 13th looms, she grapples with complex emotions while bonding with a death-row inmate who maintains his innocence. Writer/director Chinonye Chukwu's drama, starring Alfre Woodard, Richard Schiff, Danielle Brooks and Michael O'Neill.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Samuel L Jackson. Businessman Ken Carter is recruited to improve the fortunes of a failing high-school basketball team. His exacting standards soon put the players under extreme pressure - both on the court and in the classroom.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford. New York, 1945: in a nightclub, Katie Morosky encounters Hubbell Gardiner, the young man she loved from afar at university. Then, as now, their personalities and goals were very different but in matters of the heart, opposites can attract.

programme.title: Rare Beasts
programme.desc: Mandy, a career-driven single mother, juggles raising a son in the midst of a female revolution, mining the pain of her parents' separation, and professionally writing about a love that no longer exists. One day, she meets and falls in love with a troubled man, Pete, who is searching for a sense of worth and belonging. Romantic comedy drama, directed by and starring Billie Piper, with Leo Bill and Kerry Fox.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Comedy written by Willy Russell from his own play, starring Pauline Collins and Tom Conti. Liverpool housewife Shirley leads a domestic existence of routine dullness. Her monosyllabic husband's only concern is to find his supper on the table on time - things are so bad, she confides in the kitchen wall. What she needs is a holiday; a place with sun, sand and sea, a place where she can fall in love with life.

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: Sam and Tusker, partners of 20 years, embark on a journey across England in their old RV to visit friends, family and places from their past. Since Tusker was diagnosed with early-onset dementia two years ago, their time together is the most important thing they have. Romantic drama, starring Colin Firth and Stanley Tucci.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale and Amy Adams. Welterweight boxer "Irish" Micky Ward dreams of a shot at the big time, but loyalty to his dysfunctional family - particularly Dicky, his drug-addicted half-brother and coach - threatens to block his path to greatness.

programme.title: Best Sellers
programme.desc: Lucy Stanbridge has inherited her father's publishing house, and the ambitious would-be editor has nearly sunk it with failing titles. She discovers she is owed a book by Harris Shaw, a reclusive, cantankerous author who originally put the company on the map decades earlier. In a last-ditch effort to save the company, Lucy and Harris release his new book and embark on a tour that changes them both in ways they didn't expect. Comedy drama, starring Michael Caine and Aubrey Plaza.

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Helen Mirren, Manish Dayal and Om Puri. The competition for customers reaches vindaloo intensity when the Kadam family open an Indian restaurant in rural France, just across the road from the Michelin-starred establishment owned by snobbish Madame Mallory.

programme.title: My New York Year
programme.desc: In New York City in the late 1990s, a young aspiring writer lands a clerical job at the literary agency of the renowned yet reclusive JD Salinger. While her eccentric and old-fashioned boss tasks her to process Salinger's voluminous fan mail, she struggles to find her own voice. Drama, starring Margaret Qualley and Sigourney Weaver.

programme.title: Lost Girls and Love Hotels
programme.desc: Margaret works as a respected English teacher at a Japanese flight attendant academy. Haunted by her past, she begins a tumultuous love affair with a Yakuza gangster in Tokyo. William Olsson's psychological thriller, starring Alexandra Daddario, Takehiro Hira and Carice van Houten.

programme.title: The Obscure Life of the Grand Duke of Corsica
programme.desc: As a deadly epidemic slowly begins to sweep Malta, a brilliant architect embarks upon an unusual commission for an eccentric billionaire who calls himself The Grand Duke of Corsica. A state of emergency creates chaos but Alfred Rott, ever the professional, remains determined to finish the job. Comedy drama, starring Timothy Spall, Peter Stormare and Matt Hookings.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.

programme.title: Robin Roberts PresentsMahalia
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Mahalia Jackson, the New Orleans-born crooner who began singing at an early age and went on to become one of the most revered gospel figures in US history, melding her music with the Civil Rights Movement. Starring Danielle Brooks and Rob Demery.

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: Years after an unspeakable tragedy tore their lives apart, two sets of grieving parents agree to talk privately about what happened, in an attempt to move forward. First-time director Fran Kranz' drama, starring Jason Isaacs, Martha Plimpton, Reed Birney and Ann Dowd.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Comedy written by Willy Russell from his own play, starring Pauline Collins and Tom Conti. Liverpool housewife Shirley leads a domestic existence of routine dullness. In a last-ditch effort to save the company, Lucy and Harris release his new book and embark on a tour that changes them both in ways they didn't expect. Comedy drama, starring Michael Caine and Aubrey Plaza.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Eddie Redmayne and Felicity Jones. Based on a memoir by Stephen Hawking's first wife, Jane, this story about the personal and professional life of the renowned scientist follows him from his undergraduate days at Oxford, to the onset of his crippling motor neurone disease and his ground-breaking work in the field of physics.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Musical drama based on the Broadway show, starring Jamie Foxx, Beyoncé Knowles, Eddie Murphy and Oscar winner Jennifer Hudson. Three singers from Detroit known as the Dreamettes are put on the road to success by ruthless manager Curtis Taylor Jr. But his ambition to make the Dreamettes global stars soon takes its toll on the girls.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson. A group of teenage delinquents in a detention centre are given a chance to redeem themselves when their frustrated probation officer decides to turn them into a football team.

programme.title: Lost Girls and Love Hotels
programme.desc: Margaret works as a respected English teacher at a Japanese flight attendant academy. Haunted by her past, she begins a tumultuous love affair with a Yakuza gangster in Tokyo. William Olsson's psychological thriller, starring Alexandra Daddario, Takehiro Hira and Carice van Houten.

programme.title: Josie & Jack
programme.desc: A girl and her unstable brother run away from home to escape from their drunken and neglectful father. But as Jack becomes increasingly volatile, Josie starts to wonder if she should free herself from his destructive behaviour. Drama, starring Olivia DeJonge, Alex Neustaedter and William Fichtner.

programme.title: Last Call
programme.desc: Biographical drama charting the final days of Welsh poet Dylan Thomas during his tour of New York City in 1953. The poet's reputation for heavy drinking and philandering are soon forgotten, and eager audiences are captivated by his poetry lectures. Starring Rhys Ifans, John Malkovich and Rodrigo Santoro.

programme.title: Miss Juneteenth
programme.desc: Turquoise Jones is a single mother who saves every penny working at the local bar and funeral home. She hopes her 15-year-old daughter, Kai, will repeat her glory days at this year's Miss Juneteenth beauty pageant. Writer/director Channing Godfrey Peoples' drama, starring Nicole Beharie, Kendrick Sampson and Alexis Chikaeze.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Musical drama based on the Broadway show, starring Jamie Foxx, Beyoncé Knowles, Eddie Murphy and Oscar winner Jennifer Hudson. Three singers from Detroit known as the Dreamettes are put on the road to success by ruthless manager Curtis Taylor Jr. But his ambition to make the Dreamettes global stars soon takes its toll on the girls.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson. A group of teenage delinquents in a detention centre are given a chance to redeem themselves when their frustrated probation officer decides to turn them into a football team.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: Drama starring Will Smith. Taxman Ben Thomas harbours guilt over a past incident. In an attempt to make amends he decides to change the lives of seven strangers, but without revealing his motives.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Eddie Redmayne and Felicity Jones. Based on a memoir by Stephen Hawking's first wife, Jane, this story about the personal and professional life of the renowned scientist follows him from his undergraduate days at Oxford, to the onset of his crippling motor neurone disease and his ground-breaking work in the field of physics.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Period drama adapted from the classic novel, starring Winona Ryder and Susan Sarandon. Four very different sisters grow up in mid-19th-century America and come to rely on their strength of character and each other rather than privilege.

programme.title: In the Heights
programme.desc: Film version of the Broadway musical in which Usnavi, a sympathetic New York bodega owner in the neighbourhood of Washington Heights, on the northern tip of Manhattan. He saves every penny every day as he imagines and sings about a better life. Musical, starring Anthony Ramos, Corey Hawkins and Leslie Grace.

programme.title: Miss Juneteenth
programme.desc: Turquoise Jones is a single mother who saves every penny working at the local bar and funeral home. She hopes her 15-year-old daughter, Kai, will repeat her glory days at this year's Miss Juneteenth beauty pageant. Writer/director Channing Godfrey Peoples' drama, starring Nicole Beharie, Kendrick Sampson and Alexis Chikaeze.

The poet's reputation for heavy drinking and philandering are soon forgotten, and eager audiences are captivated by his poetry lectures. Starring Rhys Ifans, John Malkovich and Rodrigo Santoro.(n)

programme.title: The Last Vermeer
programme.desc: Soldier Joseph Piller investigates renowned Dutch artist Han van Meegeren, who has been accused of conspiring with the Nazis. Despite mounting evidence, Piller becomes increasingly convinced of Han's innocence and finds himself in the unlikely position of fighting to save the life of the colourful man with a mysterious past. Drama, starring Guy Pearce and Claes Bang.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Films coming up in June.(n)

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.(n)
