programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Period drama adapted from the classic novel, starring Winona Ryder and Susan Sarandon. Four very different sisters grow up in mid-19th-century America and come to rely on their strength of character and each other rather than privilege.(n)

programme.title: Sunset Blvd
programme.desc: Drama starring William Holden, Gloria Swanson and Erich von Stroheim. Screenwriter Joe Gillis floats dead in the swimming pool of a neglected Hollywood mansion. Six months earlier, out of work and desperate, he'd been hired as a writer by former silent screen star Norma Desmond, who was hoping to make a triumphant comeback.(n)

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Will Smith and featuring Jaden Smith. After his wife walks out, downtrodden medical salesman Chris Gardner is left to bring up his five-year-old son alone. The situation worsens when the pair are made homeless, but Gardner refuses to be beaten. Gaining a prestigious though unpaid stockbroker internship, he doggedly chases his dream of a better life.(n)

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: Retired sheriff George Blackledge and his horse trainer wife Margaret live on a ranch in 1960s Montana, with their son James, his wife Lorna and their son Jimmy. A freak riding accident takes James' life, and the Blackledges watch helplessly as Lorna eventually marries Donnie, who communicates with his fists. Without warning, Donnie spirits Lorna and three-year-old Jimmy away to his family home in North Dakota. Crime drama, starring Kevin Costner, Diane Lane and Kayli Carter.(n)

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: Salesman Ray Kroc attempts to turn two brothers' innovative fast food eatery into the biggest restaurant business in the world. Drama, starring Michael Keaton, Nick Offerman and John Carroll Lynch.(n)

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: Western directed by Quentin Tarantino, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Jamie Foxx, Samuel L Jackson and Christoph Waltz. After being freed from slavery and trained in the ways of a bounty hunter by Dr King Schultz, Django sets out to free his wife from a vicious plantation owner.(n)

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure based on the Marvel Comics character, starring Wesley Snipes as vampire killer Blade. In a world where vampires and humans co-exist in relative harmony, maverick bloodsucker Deacon Frost (Stephen Dorff) threatens to unleash a powerful force that will take over the Earth. Only Blade can prevent an uprising of the undead.

programme.title: Becoming
programme.desc: Alex and Lisa are a madly in love, newly engaged couple. However, their happiness is short lived when they unknowingly encounter an evil entity that possesses men by slowly stripping away their identities. Writer/director Omar Naim's fantasy thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Penelope Mitchell and Jason Patric.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: After investigating a brutal attack, paramedics Steve and Dennis patrol New Orleans dealing with equally unusual assaults. It transpires that Synchronic, a designer drug with unusual side effects, may be to blame. Before long Steve is locked in a race against time to find a missing young woman. Justin Benson and Aaron Moorhead's sci-fi thriller, starring Anthony Mackie, Jamie Dornan and Katie Aselton.

programme.title: Endless
programme.desc: When madly-in-love high-school graduates Riley and Chris are separated by a tragic car accident, Riley blames herself for her boyfriend's death while Chris is stranded in limbo. Miraculously, however, the two find a way to connect. Director Scott Speer's drama, starring Alexandra Shipp and Nicholas Hamilton.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama starring Matt Damon and Jodie Foster. In the year 2154, the wealthy elite live on a utopian space station called Elysium while the rest of the population are trapped on a ruined and polluted Earth. A dying man named Max agrees to take on a mission that could bring equality to the different worlds.

programme.title: We Still Say Grace
programme.desc: Maggie, the teenage daughter of religious fanatic Harold, attempts to escape her father's delusional suicide pact after three strangers break down near her family's remote rural compound. Thriller, starring Holly Taylor, Bruce Davison and Rita Volk.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Two astronauts become stranded in orbit when an avalanche of debris from a decommissioned satellite rips their shuttle to pieces. Their only hope for survival is to get to the International Space Station before their dwindling air supply disappears completely.

programme.title: Come Play
programme.desc: Oliver is a lonely young boy who feels different from everyone else. Desperate for a friend, he seeks solace and refuge in his ever-present mobile phone and tablet. When a mysterious creature uses Oliver's devices against him to break into the world, Oliver's parents must fight to save their son from the monster beyond the screen. Horror, starring Azhy Robertson, Gillian Jacobs and John Gallagher Jr.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama starring Matt Damon and Jodie Foster. In the year 2154, the wealthy elite live on a utopian space station called Elysium while the rest of the population are trapped on a ruined and polluted Earth. A dying man named Max agrees to take on a mission that could bring equality to the different worlds.

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt. After being killed on his first day of combat in a war against aliens, Major William Cage finds himself in a time loop, living the same day over and over again. Gaining more knowledge each time he is killed, Cage realises that the key to victory is for him to keep on dying.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Colin Farrell and Kate Beckinsale. Factory worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall, a company that implants false memories, in an effort to add a bit of excitement to his life. But while undergoing the procedure he discovers some dark secrets about himself and is soon on the run and fighting to stay alive.

programme.title: Don't Breathe 2
programme.desc: Hiding out for years in an isolated cabin, Norman Nordstrom has taken in and raised a young girl orphaned from a house fire. However, their quiet existence is shattered when a group of kidnappers show up and take the girl, forcing Norman to leave his safe haven to save her. Horror sequel, starring Stephen Lang.

programme.title: The Evil Dead
programme.desc: Sam Raimi's notorious cult horror starring Bruce Campbell. Five friends take shelter in a remote woodland cabin where they discover the Sumerian Book of the Dead and a tape containing mysterious incantations. But when they play the recording, they unwittingly unleash demons that have the power to possess the living.

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure sequel, starring Wesley Snipes as half-mortal/half-vampire Blade. When a new breed of vampire starts attacking both the human and undead communities, Blade joins forces with vampire overlord Damaskinos in a bid to counter the threat.

programme.title: We Still Say Grace
programme.desc: Maggie, the teenage daughter of religious fanatic Harold, attempts to escape her father's delusional suicide pact after three strangers break down near her family's remote rural compound. Thriller, starring Holly Taylor, Bruce Davison and Rita Volk.

programme.title: Endless
programme.desc: When madly-in-love high-school graduates Riley and Chris are separated by a tragic car accident, Riley blames herself for her boyfriend's death while Chris is stranded in limbo. Miraculously, however, the two find a way to connect. Director Scott Speer's drama, starring Alexandra Shipp and Nicholas Hamilton.

programme.title: Phobias
programme.desc: Five patients suffering from extreme phobias are put to the ultimate test under the supervision of a crazed doctor and his quest to weaponise fear. Horror anthology, directed by Joe Sill, Maritte Lee Go, Chris von Hoffmann, Camilla Belle and Jess Varley, starring Leonardo Nam, Macy Gray and Martina Garcia.

programme.title: BladeTrinity
programme.desc: The third instalment of the fantasy action adventure series, starring Wesley Snipes. Blade teams up with two other vampire hunters to thwart the plans of a gang of bloodsuckers trying to resurrect Dracula.

programme.title: Portal
programme.desc: Without warning, millions of mysterious extra-terrestrial portals suddenly appear around the world. In an attempt to determine the reason for their arrival, mankind must work together to understand the purpose of these cosmic anomalies. Fantasy thriller, starring Josh Peck, Lina Esco and Wilson Bethel.

programme.title: Antlers
programme.desc: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with an enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with an ancestral creature. Horror, starring Keri Russell, Jesse Plemons and Jeremy T Thomas.

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt. After being killed on his first day of combat in a war against aliens, Major William Cage finds himself in a time loop, living the same day over and over again. Gaining more knowledge each time he is killed, Cage realises that the key to victory is for him to keep on dying.

programme.title: 2001a Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Keir Dullea stars in Stanley Kubrick's ground-breaking science-fiction epic, which depicts the evolution of man - from primitive apes to the 21st century - through the medium of space travel.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Colin Farrell and Kate Beckinsale. Factory worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall, a company that implants false memories, in an effort to add a bit of excitement to his life. But while undergoing the procedure he discovers some dark secrets about himself and is soon on the run and fighting to stay alive.

programme.title: Antlers
programme.desc: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with an enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with an ancestral creature. Horror, starring Keri Russell, Jesse Plemons and Jeremy T Thomas.

programme.title: Interview with the Vampirethe Vampire Chronicles
programme.desc: Horror based on the novel by Anne Rice, starring Tom Cruise, Brad Pitt and Antonio Banderas. Present-day San Francisco: while being interviewed by journalist Daniel Malloy, vampire Louis tells of his life as a plantation owner in the 18th century, when, falling into depression after his wife and child die, he meets vampire Lestat who offers him the chance of eternal life.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: Science-fiction horror starring Laurence Fishburne and Sam Neill.\nThe year is 2047, and a rescue mission is sent to the outer reaches of our solar system to contact the Event Horizon, a prototype spaceship that has been missing for the last seven years. As the crew members search for survivors, they discover the terrifying secrets that lie within the mysterious spaceship.

programme.title: BladeTrinity
programme.desc: The third instalment of the fantasy action adventure series, starring Wesley Snipes. Blade teams up with two other vampire hunters to thwart the plans of a gang of bloodsuckers trying to resurrect Dracula.

programme.title: Portal
programme.desc: Without warning, millions of mysterious extra-terrestrial portals suddenly appear around the world. In an attempt to determine the reason for their arrival, mankind must work together to understand the purpose of these cosmic anomalies. Fantasy thriller, starring Josh Peck, Lina Esco and Wilson Bethel.

programme.title: 2001a Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Keir Dullea stars in Stanley Kubrick's ground-breaking science-fiction epic, which depicts the evolution of man - from primitive apes to the 21st century - through the medium of space travel.

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Sci-fi action horror starring Milla Jovovich and Michelle Rodriguez. When a mutant virus turns the workers at a hi-tech research facility into flesh-eating zombies, a crack team of soldiers must race against time to overcome the laboratory's super-computer system and stop the outbreak spreading.

programme.title: Resident EvilApocalypse
programme.desc: Sci-fi action horror sequel starring Milla Jovovich. Zombies from the 2002 video-game adaptation break out from the underground research facility to wreak havoc on the quarantined city above. With time running out, a group of survivors battle to escape the ravenous undead...

programme.title: Resident EvilExtinction
programme.desc: Science-fiction action horror starring Milla Jovovich. With a virus having reduced large swathes of America to wasteland, biogenetically enhanced Alice fights zombies and monstrous mutations in the ruins of Las Vegas.

programme.title: Resident EvilAfterlife
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller sequel starring Milla Jovovich. Alice continues her quest to find survivors of the virus that turns people into the living dead, and lead them to safety. But information about a possible safe haven in Los Angeles has to be treated with caution.

programme.title: Resident EvilRetribution
programme.desc: Fifth instalment in the sci-fi horror franchise, starring Milla Jovovich. Freedom fighter Alice is forced to battle her way out of the headquarters of the Umbrella Corporation after waking up to find herself trapped in its darkest recesses.

programme.desc: A deadly zombie virus is unleashed on a small town, and two special forces agents are sent in to contain the outbreak. programme.desc: Sci-fi action horror starring Milla Jovovich and Michelle Rodriguez. When a mutant virus turns the workers at a hi-tech research facility into flesh-eating zombies, a crack team of soldiers must race against time to overcome the laboratory's super-computer system and stop the outbreak spreading.(n)

programme.title: The Last Job
programme.desc: An elderly man with terminal cancer seeks revenge on the thieves who have destroyed his life. But with his family caught in the crosshairs, he must finally face the consequences of his dark past. Crime thriller, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Mira Sorvino and Pruitt Taylor Vince.

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, Eugene Evans dreams of escaping his small Texas town when he discovers a wounded, fugitive bank robber. Torn between claiming the bounty for her capture and his growing attraction to the seductive criminal, Eugene must make a decision that will affect the lives of everyone he's ever loved. Romantic drama, starring Finn Cole and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: While out on a father-son border patrol, a man named Jackson kills a Mexican immigrant boy. His father tries taking the blame, but Jackson flees south on horseback, becoming a gringo `illegal alien" in Mexico. Chased by Texas Rangers and Mexican federales, Jackson journeys across Mexico to seek forgiveness from the dead boy's father, only to fall in love with the land he was taught to hate. Action adventure, starring Jake Allyn and Frank Grillo.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two movie producers who owe money to the Mob set up their aging star actor for an insurance scam to try and save themselves, but they wind up getting more than they ever imagined. Crime comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Tommy Lee Jones and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Promising Young Woman
programme.desc: Oscar-winning thriller starring Carey Mulligan. Haunted by a traumatic incident from her time at medical school, 30-year-old Cassie spends her evenings ensnaring predatory men in clubs and teaching them some harsh life lessons. When she discovers an opportunity to bring a man from her past to justice, Cassie gets to work enacting the ultimate revenge plot.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Wander
programme.desc: After getting hired to probe a suspicious death in the small town of Wander, a mentally unstable private investigator becomes convinced the case is linked to the same `conspiracy cover-up" that caused the death of his daughter. Thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Tommy Lee Jones, Heather Graham and Katheryn Winnick.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Psychological thriller remake of director John Frankenheimer's 1962 classic, starring Denzel Washington, Meryl Streep and Liev Schreiber. Following his experiences in the the first Gulf War, tormented US Army major Bennett Marco becomes the key to a complex political conspiracy when a decorated member of his patrol makes a bid for the White House.

programme.title: Promising Young Woman
programme.desc: Oscar-winning thriller starring Carey Mulligan. Haunted by a traumatic incident from her time at medical school, 30-year-old Cassie spends her evenings ensnaring predatory men in clubs and teaching them some harsh life lessons. When she discovers an opportunity to bring a man from her past to justice, Cassie gets to work enacting the ultimate revenge plot.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Biographical crime drama starring Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe. Following the death of his mentor, Frank Lucas establishes himself as the number one distributor of heroin in the US by coming up with a unique new method of importing. But then he attracts the attention of dogged Newark detective Richie Roberts.

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta and Joe Pesci. In 1950s New York, Irish-Italian schoolboy Henry Hill dreams of becoming a gangster and lands a job parking cars for the Mob. Having earned the respect of the local Mafia boss, he is teamed with hitmen James Conway and Tommy DeVito. But as the years pass, Hill finds his allegiance to the Mob challenged as he descends deeper into organised crime.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Psychological thriller remake of director John Frankenheimer's 1962 classic, starring Denzel Washington, Meryl Streep and Liev Schreiber. Following his experiences in the the first Gulf War, tormented US Army major Bennett Marco becomes the key to a complex political conspiracy when a decorated member of his patrol makes a bid for the White House.

programme.title: Wander
programme.desc: After getting hired to probe a suspicious death in the small town of Wander, a mentally unstable private investigator becomes convinced the case is linked to the same `conspiracy cover-up" that caused the death of his daughter. Thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Tommy Lee Jones, Heather Graham and Katheryn Winnick.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey Stein, an American working in Cologne for a drug dealer, falls for Juliette, a sick woman in need of a kidney transplant. Casey tries to get the cash Juliette needs for the operation by stealing from a crime lord. Co-writer and director Eran Creevy's action thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Felicity Jones, Ben Kingsley and Anthony Hopkins.

programme.title: False Positive
programme.desc: After months of trying and failing to get pregnant, Lucy and Adrian finally find their dream fertility doctor in the illustrious Dr Hindle. But after becoming pregnant with a healthy baby girl, Lucy begins to notice something sinister through Hindle's gleaming charm, and she sets out to uncover the unsettling truth about him. Horror, starring Ilana Glazer, Justin Theroux and Pierce Brosnan.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: Thriller based on a true story starring Dev Patel. In 2008, ten Pakistani terrorists arrive in Mumbai and embark on a series of attacks throughout the city. After four of the gunmen enter the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel and start shooting, a waiter and the hotel's head chef are among those attempting to save guests' lives as they wait for help to come.

programme.title: Silk Road
programme.desc: DEA agent Rick Bowden is reassigned to cyber crime, and following a visit to one of his informants, Bowden begins gathering evidence on Silk Road, which is generating $1.2million a day through the anonymous sale of narcotics. Meanwhile, site owner Ross Ulbricht ignores the dire warnings of girlfriend Julia and best friend Max to obsessively expand his empire, with the help of one of his most trusted vendors. Thriller, starring Nick Robinson, Jason Clarke and Jennifer Yun.

programme.title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
programme.desc: A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness, with a survival expert sent to protect him - and a forest fire threatening to consume them all. Crime drama, starring Angelina Jolie, Nicholas Hoult and Finn Little.

programme.title: False Positive
programme.desc: After months of trying and failing to get pregnant, Lucy and Adrian finally find their dream fertility doctor in the illustrious Dr Hindle. But after becoming pregnant with a healthy baby girl, Lucy begins to notice something sinister through Hindle's gleaming charm, and she sets out to uncover the unsettling truth about him. Horror, starring Ilana Glazer, Justin Theroux and Pierce Brosnan.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's epic Oscar-winning crime drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino and James Caan. In New York following the Second World War, Don Corleone is determined that his family should keep control of the American crime world. His daughter Connie is to be married, an occasion that draws guests pledging gifts to the couple in the hope that they will be granted favours by the "Godfather".

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Courtroom thriller starring Richard Gere and featuring Edward Norton. Arrogant lawyer Martin Vail takes on the seemingly unwinnable case of Aaron Stampler, a young altar boy accused of murdering an archbishop. Vail is chiefly concerned with gaining the maximum amount of media attention for himself.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's controversial psychological drama starring Robert De Niro, Cybill Shepherd and Jodie Foster. Travis Bickle is an alienated ex-Marine, working nights as a New York cabbie. Haunted by the squalor of what he sees around him, he is drawn to the beautiful - and "pure" - Betsy. But his attempts to woo her prove to be disastrous, and he begins an inexorable descent into a personal hell, a descent that can only end in the bloodiest of climaxes.

programme.title: Dragged across Concrete
programme.desc: Two overzealous cops get suspended from the force when a video of their strong-arm tactics is leaked. Low on cash and with no other options, they delve into the criminal underworld to get their proper compensation, but find far more than they wanted awaiting them in the shadows. Crime drama, starring Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: Thriller based on a true story starring Dev Patel. In 2008, ten Pakistani terrorists arrive in Mumbai and embark on a series of attacks throughout the city. After four of the gunmen enter the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel and start shooting, a waiter and the hotel's head chef are among those attempting to save guests' lives as they wait for help to come.

programme.title: The Hole
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Chris Massoglia and Haley Bennett. Susan Thompson and her sons Dane and Lucas move from New York to the countryside, where the brothers soon strike up a friendship with next-door neighbour Julie. But when they discover a bottomless pit in the basement, it's not long before their worst fears are manifested.

programme.title: The Birthday Cake
programme.desc: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, a man named Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle - a mob boss - for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, however, Gio's life is changed for ever. Crime thriller, starring Shiloh Fernandez, Val Kilmer and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's epic Oscar-winning crime drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino and James Caan. In New York following the Second World War, Don Corleone is determined that his family should keep control of the American crime world. His daughter Connie is to be married, an occasion that draws guests pledging gifts to the couple in the hope that they will be granted favours by the "Godfather".

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: Lives are left in pieces after a white police officer responds to a hostage call and kills the black suspect, only to learn he may have been set up. Facing trial, he must find the person responsible for the subterfuge, while also examining his own accountability in the case. Drama, starring Brian Geraghty, Sharon Leal, Bethany Joy Lenz and Jim Beaver.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Crime comedy drama, starring John Boyega, Olivia Cooke, Bill Skarsgard and Ed Skrein.

programme.title: The Birthday Cake
programme.desc: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, a man named Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle - a mob boss - for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, however, Gio's life is changed for ever. Crime thriller, starring Shiloh Fernandez, Val Kilmer and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Epic crime drama starring Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton. Michael Corleone is determined to legitimise the family business, but struggles to escape its violent past. With his leadership challenged by rival factions, Michael becomes increasingly obsessed with family loyalty, as he remembers his late father's first, challenging days in America.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Samuel L Jackson, Vanessa Williams, Jeffrey Wright and Christian Bale. Two years after a murder suspect skipped bail, detective John Shaft is given a second opportunity to get his man. But the path to justice is blocked by a ruthless drug baron intent on murdering the only witness to the crime.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: In this remake of the German film It Happened in Broad Daylight, Richard E Grant plays a detective determined to track down a serial killer targeting children. However, the cop's unhealthy obsession with the case prompts him to embark on a dangerous scheme to use another youngster as bait. Tense thriller, starring Richard E Grant, Lynsey Baxter and Simon Cadell.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Crime comedy drama, starring John Boyega, Olivia Cooke, Bill Skarsgard and Ed Skrein.

programme.title: Muscle
programme.desc: Unhappy and unambitious office worker Simon joins a gym, but soon finds his life being taken over by Terry, his very hands-on personal trainer, who reveals himself to be more committed and dangerous than Simon could have ever imagined. Gerard Johnson's psychological black-and-white thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and Cavan Clerkin.

programme.title: The Hole
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Chris Massoglia and Haley Bennett. Susan Thompson and her sons Dane and Lucas move from New York to the countryside, where the brothers soon strike up a friendship with next-door neighbour Julie. But when they discover a bottomless pit in the basement, it's not long before their worst fears are manifested.

programme.title: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: An attorney defends an old family friend who has been accused of murdering his father. The accused has refused to talk ever since being picked up by the police - but given that he was found standing over the victim's body and his palm print was on the murder weapon, the defence faces an uphill task. Courtroom drama, starring Keanu Reeves, Renee Zellweger, Gugu Mbatha Raw, Gabriel Basso and Jim Belushi.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: Crime thriller directed by Guy Ritchie, and starring Jason Statham and Ray Liotta. Jake Green leaves prison determined to avenge the murder of his sister-in-law by men working for ruthless casino boss Dorothy Macha, the person also responsible for his incarceration. But after a confrontation at Macha's club, Green becomes a target for the villain's henchmen.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Epic crime drama starring Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton. Michael Corleone is determined to legitimise the family business, but struggles to escape its violent past. With his leadership challenged by rival factions, Michael becomes increasingly obsessed with family loyalty, as he remembers his late father's first, challenging days in America.

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: A dinner party in a country house sees four friends come together for a birthday celebration. But as the night progresses, secrets emerge and unsettling events begin to unfold around them. As manners give way to madness, an idyllic evening of celebration descends into a dark night of terror - and the group's civilised dinner party turns out to be anything but. Thriller, starring Iwan Rheon, Catalina Sandino Moreno and Tom Cullen.

programme.title: The Desperate Hour
programme.desc: Recently widowed mother Amy Carr finds her small town thrown into chaos as a shooting takes place at her son's school. Miles away on foot in the dense forest, Amy desperately races against time to save her son as authorities place the town on lockdown. Thriller, starring Naomi Watts, Colton Gobbo and Sierra Maltby.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: Crime thriller directed by Guy Ritchie, and starring Jason Statham and Ray Liotta. Jake Green leaves prison determined to avenge the murder of his sister-in-law by men working for ruthless casino boss Dorothy Macha, the person also responsible for his incarceration. But after a confrontation at Macha's club, Green becomes a target for the villain's henchmen.

programme.title: The Godfather Part III
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's finale to The Godfather saga, starring Al Pacino, Diane Keaton and Andy Garcia. New York, 1979: Michael Corleone wants out of his criminal empire in a search for respectability. But it's difficult to break with the family tradition. Inevitably, the tentacles of the old business prove all-embracing and powerful, with fatal consequences.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Gillian Flynn's bestseller, starring Ben Affleck and Rosamund Pike. When Amy Dunne goes missing on the fifth anniversary of her marriage to Nick, all the evidence points towards her husband having killed her. Despite protesting his innocence, Nick's secretive nature, unflattering media appearances and some incriminating clues combine to make him look even guiltier. But is he actually telling the truth?

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Tom Hardy and Emily Browning. The notorious Kray twins rule the East End underworld with iron fists. But while no outsider dare challenge their dominance, Reggie Kray suffers a personal battle when he is increasingly forced to choose between loyalty to his unpredictable brother Ron and his wife Frances.

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: A dinner party in a country house sees four friends come together for a birthday celebration. Thriller, starring Naomi Watts, Colton Gobbo and Sierra Maltby.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey Stein, an American working in Cologne for a drug dealer, falls for Juliette, a sick woman in need of a kidney transplant. Casey tries to get the cash Juliette needs for the operation by stealing from a crime lord. Co-writer and director Eran Creevy's action thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Felicity Jones, Ben Kingsley and Anthony Hopkins.(n)

programme.title: MissionImpossible
programme.desc: Action spy thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Emmanuelle Béart. The elite Impossible Mission Force's latest assignment is to recover stolen information that threatens to blow the cover of US spies throughout the world. But the plan goes disastrously wrong.(n)

programme.title: MissionImpossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of former colleague-gone-bad Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather Part III
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's finale to The Godfather saga, starring Al Pacino, Diane Keaton and Andy Garcia. New York, 1979: Michael Corleone wants out of his criminal empire in a search for respectability. But it's difficult to break with the family tradition. Inevitably, the tentacles of the old business prove all-embracing and powerful, with fatal consequences.(n)

programme.title: Stillwater\n
programme.desc: Unemployed Bill Baker travels from his home in Stillwater, Oklahoma to Marseille, France to visit his estranged daughter Allison, who was imprisoned five years earlier for a murder she claims she didn't commit. Confronted with an insurmountable language barrier, cross-cultural differences and maddening legal complexity, Baker decides to take matters into his own hands to exonerate his only child after failing to get Allison's case re-opened. Crime thriller, starring Matt Damon and Abigail Breslin.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Maggie Grace and Toby Kebbell. With a category 5 hurricane bearing down on an Alabama town, an opportunistic group of crooks use the meteorological mayhem as cover for an audacious raid on a US Treasury facility. However, standing in the criminals' way are a maverick ATF agent and a stormchaser with a tragic past.(n)

programme.title: MissionImpossible
programme.desc: Action spy thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Emmanuelle Béart. The elite Impossible Mission Force's latest assignment is to recover stolen information that threatens to blow the cover of US spies throughout the world. But the plan goes disastrously wrong.(n)

Confronted with an insurmountable language barrier, cross-cultural differences and maddening legal complexity, Baker decides to take matters into his own hands to exonerate his only child after failing to get Allison's case re-opened. Crime thriller, starring Matt Damon and Abigail Breslin.(n)

programme.title: Franklyn
programme.desc: Fantasy thriller starring Sam Riley, Ryan Philippe, Eva Green and Bernard Hill. The fates of four lost souls intertwine on the streets of London and its futuristic parallel universe Meanwhile City.

programme.title: The Fighting Seabees
programme.desc: Second World War drama starring John Wayne and Susan Hayward. Wedge Donovan leads the Seabees, a battalion of construction workers whose efforts to build vital installations in the Pacific are compromised by the invading Japanese.

programme.title: The War Lover
programme.desc: War drama starring Steve McQueen and Robert Wagner. Bomber pilot Buzz Rickson has a daredevil ability under fire that is appreciated by the rest of his American crew. But back on the ground, Buzz's recklessness causes trouble, and things come to a head when he makes a move on the woman that his co-pilot, Ed Bolland, has started dating.

programme.title: Three Billboards Interview Special
programme.desc: Writer-director Martin McDonagh and star Sam Rockwell talk about making the dramatic comedy about revenge and redemption in small-town America.

programme.title: The Admirable Crichton
programme.desc: Comedy adventure based on the play by JM Barrie, starring Kenneth More. A butler finds that his common-sense values give him the upper hand over his aristocratic employer when they are marooned on a tropical island.

programme.title: Carry On Constable
programme.desc: Comedy starring Sidney James, Kenneth Williams and Hattie Jacques. Sergeant Wilkins becomes increasingly exasperated after four inept policemen join his staff during a flu epidemic and cause chaos while on the beat.

programme.title: A Walk in the Woods
programme.desc: Adventure based on a true story, starring Robert Redford and Nick Nolte. Much to his wife's consternation, American travel writer Bill Bryson, now living in England, decides to reconnect with his homeland by embarking on an epic hike along the Appalachian Trail. Joining him is one of his oldest friends, the wild and unpredictable Stephen Katz.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L Jackson. Still smarting from a previous bungled job, security expert Michael Bryce has the chance to redeem himself by delivering hired killer Darius Kincaid to court, to testify against a despot dictator. But there are plenty of people who don't want Kincaid to arrive alive.

programme.title: Honey Boy
programme.desc: A movie star struggling with addiction must look back at a childhood shaped by his unpredictable father, a one-time rodeo clown. Drama written by and starring Shia LaBeouf, with Laura San Giacomo.

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: True-story-inspired thriller, based on the book by Giles Foden, starring James McAvoy and Forest Whitaker. In the early 1970s, inexperienced Scottish doctor Nicholas Garrigan sets off to Uganda to help the poverty-stricken populace, but a bizarre encounter with the country's newly installed leader, Idi Amin, brings a dramatic change of direction.

programme.title: Esther Waters
programme.desc: Period melodrama, set in the 19th century, starring Kathleen Ryan and Dirk Bogarde. Esther Waters, a servant girl at a country estate, becomes pregnant by housekeeper's son William Latch, who then abandons her. But they are destined to meet again years later.

programme.title: Kansas Raiders
programme.desc: Western starring Audie Murphy and Brian Donlevy. During the American Civil War, a youthful Jesse James falls under the spell of ruthless vigilante leader William Quantrill, until events force him to strike out on his own.

programme.title: The Day Will Dawn
programme.desc: Second World War romance starring Ralph Richardson, Deborah Kerr and Hugh Williams. As the rest of Europe falls to Adolf Hitler, journalist Colin Metcalfe is stationed in Norway, hungry for a scoop. While helping to locate a secret Nazi U-boat base, he becomes romantically involved with the daughter of a local seaman.

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: Western starring Randolph Scott, Richard Boone and Maureen O'Sullivan. The courageous Pat Brennan and newlyweds Doretta and Willard Mims are taken hostage at a stagecoach station by bandits, whose ruthless leader, Usher, has no qualms about killing anyone who gets in his way.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. When Sam Baldwin's wife dies, he is left to bring up his eight-year-old son Jonah alone, and decides to move to Seattle to make a new start. On Christmas Eve, Jonah rings a radio phone-in with his Christmas wish to find a new wife for his dad. Meanwhile in Baltimore, journalist Annie Reed, who is having doubts about her own relationship, is listening in.

programme.title: Three Billboards Interview Special
programme.desc: Writer-director Martin McDonagh and star Sam Rockwell talk about making the dramatic comedy about revenge and redemption in small-town America.

programme.title: Kingsmanthe Secret Service
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Colin Firth, Samuel L Jackson and Taron Egerton. A tearaway street kid is recruited to join a shadowy secret organisation. But even before he's earned his stripes, he's pitched into a battle to save the planet from domination by a criminal mastermind.

programme.title: My Beautiful Laundrette
programme.desc: Drama starring Daniel Day-Lewis and Gordon Warnecke. After his shady uncle makes him manager of a neglected London launderette, Omar, an eager Asian youth, seeks the help of his old school friend Johnny who has links with a racist gang. Against a background of racial tension in the area, Omar and Johnny set about giving their new business a facelift.

programme.title: The Pyramid
programme.desc: Horror starring Ashley Hinshaw and Denis O'Hare. A team of archaeologists become trapped while exploring the chambers of a pyramid. And they soon realise they are not alone.

programme.title: Strategic Air Command
programme.desc: Drama starring James Stewart. With the Second World War over, star baseball player "Dutch" Holland can return to the game. But the US Air Force needs good pilots to fly the new jet bombers that carry atomic weapons. Reluctantly, Holland agrees to return to the skies.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Vanessa Redgrave and Glenda Jackson. Mary Stuart returns to Scotland from France to accept the title of Queen, but her arrival is met with hostility from Protestant nobles. Meanwhile Mary's scheming cousin, Queen Elizabeth of England, and her equally devious half-brother, James, have desires on the crown themselves.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: Psychological western starring Glenn Ford and William Holden. When unstable Civil War veteran Owen Devereaux becomes a judge in Colorado, his marshal, Del Stewart, tries to keep his ex-army colleague's psychotic tendencies under control.

programme.title: Transformersthe Last Knight
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring Mark Wahlberg and Anthony Hopkins. When Optimus Prime returns to what is left of Cybertron, he is brainwashed by seductive leader Quintessa to return to Earth to obtain a mystical staff belonging to Merlin which will bring his home planet back to life.

programme.title: KingsmanThe Golden Circle
programme.desc: Spy action adventure starring Taron Egerton, Colin Firth and Julianne Moore. Now a card-carrying Kingsman agent, Eggsy is a certified super-spy who has inherited the title of his late mentor. But when the head of a major drugs cartel takes out most of his fellow agents, Eggsy must confront a new nemesis, and join forces with his American counterparts: the Statesmen.

programme.title: Red Heat
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and James Belushi. When Moscow policeman Captain Ivan Danko is sent to the US to track down a Russian drug dealer, he is partnered with Art Ridzik, a brash Chicago detective whose style of policing proves to be in total contrast to that of the militaristic Danko.

programme.title: Kill Your Friends
programme.desc: Black comedy thriller starring Nicholas Hoult, based on the novel by John Niven. In the cut-throat world of music promotion, ruthless A&R man Stelfox goes to the very extreme to make sure he stays at the top of the game and find his next hit record.

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Joey Cramer. On 4 July 1978, 12-year-old David Freeman takes a tumble and wakes up in an altered world: his home and family are changed, and a voice in his head is calling for help. Meanwhile, Nasa scientists discover a mysterious alien spacecraft. Is there a connection?

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: Thriller starring Matthew Broderick and Ally Sheedy. When teenager David Lightman hacks into a computer system hundreds of miles away and is challenged to play Global Thermonuclear Warfare, he thinks he's found a brand-new game. But at the Combined Operations Centre in Cheyenne, the Third World War has started.

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Dennis Quaid and David Thewlis, and featuring the voice of Sean Connery. Bowen, a knight from the Arthurian school, teaches younger men the honourable ways of medieval chivalry. When one of his former charges becomes a merciless tyrant, Bowen is prevailed upon to assist the rebel forces and turns to Draco, the last dragon in the land, for help.

programme.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Georgia Groome. With her 15th birthday fast approaching, Georgia Nicolson has two aims in life - to throw the greatest party ever and persuade local hunk Robbie to become her first boyfriend. Putting aside worries about her squabbling parents, Georgia sets about learning the art of proper kissing with the help of friends Jas, Rosie and Ellen.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Hayden Christensen, Samuel L Jackson and Jamie Bell. When high-school student David Rice discovers he has the ability to teleport himself to any place on Earth, he uses his new-found skill for a life of carefree self-indulgence. But events take a darker turn when David discovers he is only one of many "jumpers" and that their lives are under threat from a shady organisation.

programme.title: The Day after Tomorrow
programme.desc: Disaster movie from Independence Day director Roland Emmerich, starring Dennis Quaid and Jake Gyllenhaal. When climatologist Jack Hall tries to warn Washington that the planet is facing an imminent, catastrophic climate shift, government officials fail to take him seriously. But, when the Earth abruptly plunges into a new ice age, it soon becomes clear that the human race is facing extinction.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring Nick Frost, Jodie Whittaker and John Boyega. On the mean streets of south London, five teenagers in the process of mugging a woman are disturbed by an alien invader. Soon their housing estate is overrun with beings from outer space and the hunters have become the hunted.

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: Horror starring Shannyn Sossamon and James Ransone. A single mother and her twin sons are unaware their rural farmhouse is marked for death by an evil demon who has been conjured up by a series of old ghost films.(n)

programme.title: Two by Two
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Callum Maloney and Ava Connolly. An ark has been built to save all the animals from a massive flood that threatens the world. But when it sails, two colourful creatures, Finny and Leah, are accidentally left behind. They must use all their courage to stay alive until they can be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: Fantasy comedy starring John Cleese and Sean Connery. A young boy called Kevin is transported through time by a group of dwarves who have a map revealing gaps in the universe. Robin Hood and Napoleon are among the characters they meet on their bizarre journey.(n)

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Comedy starring Michael J Fox. Everyone suffers growing pains but Scott is in a class of his own. When this previously average high-school student discovers that he is turning into a werewolf, he decides to turn his strange genetic inheritance to his advantage.(n)

programme.title: Star TrekInsurrection
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Patrick Stewart and Jonathan Frakes. The planet Ba'ku holds magical properties that keep the population young and living in harmony. So when an alien race attempts to take over this paradise, it falls to Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise to defend the planet and its people.(n)

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: War thriller starring Helen Mirren and Aaron Paul. Colonel Katherine Powell heads a top-secret operation to capture some high-ranking terrorists. But a sudden change in circumstances forces Powell and her bosses to confront a moral and political dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Jack ReacherNever Go Back
programme.desc: Action sequel starring Tom Cruise and Cobie Smulders. After being wrongly accused of murder, Jack Reacher goes on the run with Major Turner, who has been accused of selling government secrets. Can they clear their names before being caught?(n)

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Legal thriller based on John Grisham's bestseller, starring Tom Cruise, Jeanne Tripplehorn and Gene Hackman. Top Harvard law graduate Mitch McDeere expects to find work in the big city, but the highest bid for his talents comes from a paternalistic Memphis firm. Mitch throws himself into the job, despite his wife Abby's reservations, only to be warned by the FBI that the deaths of two company associates weren't accidental.(n)

programme.desc: A career-driven woman's life is turned upside down when she has an affair with her boss's wife.

programme.title: Flag Day
programme.desc: A loving, caring father leads a double life as a bank robber and counterfeiter to provide and care for his daughter.

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect a young boy who is the sole witness to a murder.

programme.title: Witness

programme.desc: A detective and forensic psychologist investigates the kidnapping of a senator's daughter by a schizophrenic psychopath.

programme.desc: A group of party-goers discovers items associated with witchcraft when they investigate an apartment where a woman has died. One man notices a strange bite mark on his arm - a sign that he has been marked for possession by a demonic entity.

programme.desc: An overweight lawyer accidentally kills a woman while driving. He gets away with it and is cursed by a gypsy woman on his way out of the courthouse. He starts to lose weight at a frightening rate and tries to find a way to stop the curse.

programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes attempts to solve a series of bizarre murders that appear to be suicides.

programme.title: Maverick
programme.desc: Bart thwarts an assassination attempt on a politician. But the target is too badly injured to continue his election campaign, forcing Bart to run for office in his place.

programme.title: Hitlerthe Last Ten Days
programme.desc: Trapped in his bunker, the Nazi leader struggles to deny the impending end of his regime. As the reality of the Allied offensive on Berlin becomes impossible to ignore, the defeated dictator makes plans to marry Eva Braun, and bring his life to an end. Fact-based Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness and Simon Ward.

programme.title: Sugarfoot
programme.desc: Tom is forced to lead a group of outlaws safely through the desert, accompanied by a man whose son was killed by the bandits and has revenge in mind.

programme.title: Maverick
programme.desc: Bret wins a herd of sheep in a poker game, and struggles to sell them in a territory dominated by cattle farmers, who do not take kindly to sheep herders.

programme.title: Fort Osage
programme.desc: A frontier scout leads a wagon train from Missouri to the gold fields in California, and finds the two men organising the journey are ruthlessly exploiting the people under their protection. They have also broken a treaty with the local Osage Indian tribe, putting everyone's lives in danger. Western, starring Rod Cameron and Jane Nigh.

programme.title: Gun for a Coward
programme.desc: Three brothers attempt to deal with a band of cattle rustlers attacking their herd, but personal differences soon prompt them to start fighting each other instead, causing heartache for their mother and placing their future in jeopardy. Western, starring Fred MacMurray, Jeffrey Hunter and Dean Stockwell.

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: A stagecoach comes under attack, and the crisis forces the passengers to reveal their deepest secrets as the pressure mounts. Western, starring Kent Taylor and John Smith.

programme.title: The Searchers
programme.desc: Classic western starring John Wayne, Jeffrey Hunter and Natalie Wood. John Ford's masterpiece tells the story of Ethan Edwards and his five-year search for the last surviving member of his murdered family - a young girl captured by Comanches.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams and Russell Crowe. In a far away galaxy, as the planet Krypton is about to explode, scientist Jor-El sends his baby son Kal to Earth. As he grows to manhood, Kal - under the human guise of Clark Kent - seeks to master his extraordinary powers and find out where he comes from. Meanwhile, an old enemy of Jor-El's makes his way to Earth determined to have his revenge.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Action comedy thriller starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover and Joe Pesci. Days before he is due to retire, detective Roger Murtaugh, along with his partner Martin Riggs, is demoted after an attempt to defuse a bomb results in the destruction of an office building. But the maverick cops' return to the beat is short-lived, and they are soon back in plain clothes and in hot pursuit of a former cop now involved in gun running.

programme.title: The Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: Comedy starring Peter Sellers, Robert Morley and Constance Cummings. The unassuming accountant of an Edinburgh textile works comes up with a surprising solution to the problems his employer is having with an American efficiency expert.

programme.desc: Western adventure starring John Wayne. After Napoleon's defeat at Waterloo, hundreds of exiled French families settle in the wilds of Alabama. programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Clint Eastwood and Patricia Clarkson. San Francisco cop "Dirty" Harry Callahan investigates a macabre gambling game known as the "dead pool" that involves predicting local celebrities' deaths.

programme.title: Reversal of Fortune
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the trial of wealthy socialite Claus von Bulow, who was sentenced to 30 years imprisonment for the attempted murder of his wife - a conviction that was overturned by brilliant lawyer Alan Dershowitz. Starring an Oscar-winning Jeremy Irons alongside Glenn Close, Ron Silver, Fisher Stevens and Annabella Sciorra.

programme.title: The Lost Boys

It's a place where a Vampires Everywhere comic could save your life and where, if you are very unlucky, you'll never grow old, you'll never die and you'll always have fresh blood to drink.
